story:
Thank You!

Hello everyone, Ultravet Medical Devices is proud to announce that with your help we have raised over 24,000 dollars through our initial Indiegogo campaign and as a result, we can begin prototype development & production on our Tucker Valve™ .  Thank you to all who helped support us in the fight against canine degenerative valve disease.  To learn more about our initial campaign, please visit http://igg.me/at/TuckerValve.

Clinical Trials 

We have created a second campaign to generate funds for clinical trials.  We plan to begin clinical trials during the first quarter of 2016.  Our clinical trials study will be a multi-center study including sites in New York, New Jersey, Pennsylvania and California.  Once we have raised enough money to begin clinical trials, inclusion criteria and site locations will be revealed and we will have a contact form available for those who have a pet that may be an eligible participant. 

There will be two arms of the clinical trial study, a standard medical treatment only arm and a valve replacement arm.  The purpose of the clinical trial study is to show that our transcatheter valve will be significantly more effective in treating severe degenerative valve disease compared to standard medical treatment.

Canine Heart Disease

As we mentioned in our initial campaign, valvular heart disease in dogs is a significant cause of morbidity and death. Approximately 8 million dogs in the United States are estimated to have cardiac disease; the majority of those cases are due to valvular disease. A significant portion of those animals have severe enough regurgitation to develop clinical signs and suffer chronic progression of the disease. Despite decades of clinical research and clinical drug trials, there is no definitive medical treatment for the disease that will prevent the progression to congestive heart failure and death.        



  

Veterinary surgeons have demonstrated that open heart surgery with valve replacement or repair can provide excellent reductions of regurgitant fractions with resolution of clinical signs. However, the surgery is very expensive and there is a scarcity of veterinary open heart programs operating around the world. As a result, surgical treatment is not very accessible for most pet owners.  The development of successful interventional transcatheter therapy for the treatment of degenerative valve diseases in dogs could dramatically improve the success rate for treating these animals.  Our Tucker Valve™ is the answer to this widespread problem!

The Tucker Valve™

As you know, the Tucker Valve™ was named after Dr. Kramer's dog Tucker who was one of the dogs in the pilot study for this device.  We thought we would share some great photo's of Tucker being silly and playful. 

                   

    


                                  

We were recently featured in a new article in K9 Magazine which can be found by clicking here.  Dr. Kramer also did an interview with The Radio Pet Lady Network.  His interview aired Saturday December 12th at 11AM.  To listen to the show please click here.

We have also partnered with our local Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza to help raise additonal funds for the Tucker Valve during the month of January.  See below for details.


What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to move this project forward even further.  Donated funds will be used to perform clinical trials with the eventual goal of bringing the device to market.  It is extremely important to our team that we create a cure for this terrible disease and keep those dogs suffering from it healthy and happy, enabling them to live long lives with their families.  Hopefully, with your help the Tucker Valve™ will allow that to happen.

To show our appreciation for your support, we have numerous perks available.  Some of those perks include a framed picture of our mascot Ollie (pictured below), a commemorative brick on our pet walkway at our partner facility, Atlantic Coast Veterinary Specialists, a 3D hologram of a K9 heart with chronic mitral valve disease, and two tickets to the 2016 Westminster show in NYC.

The Impact

As mentioned in our initial campaign, the timing of this project is optimal for making a measurable and significant impact within the veterinary community. What makes our valve so unique is that it is a curative solution versus current standard medical management of the disease. It is also minimally invasive and much more cost effective and accessible than open-heart surgery. By having a more affordable option, we will be able to reach a wider patient population and make a solution to degenerative mitral/tricuspid valve disease much more attainable to dog owners everywhere.


Other Ways You Can Help

While we appreciate your financial support, we understand that a donation may not be possible for all who are passionate about our cause.  If you are unable to donate you can still help us by spreading the word and making some noise about our campaign.  Please share with your friends, family and co-workers on social media and remember to use the Indiegogo share tools to make doing so easier!

From our family at Ultravet Medical Devices to yours, thank you for your support!

Love Always, Ollie

story:
All Jump Start Perks claimed -$250 + ship, please use Early Adopter


  "Finally!  An effective, new way to help

relieve back pain at home."

Have you tried the following and still remain in pain??

- Inversion
- TENS machines
- Decompression and Traction
- Spinal Injections
- Corrective Exercise & Stretching
- Acupuncture
- YOGA

If you have tried any of these methods - not to mention the meds you've had to take in the interim - and still have pain, there is a new alternative.  After decades of back pain; pain that severely limited his activities and sometimes debilitated him, Marty Abercrombie discovered a method to:

  • release muscle stress
  • work trigger points
  • invigorate nerve activity
  • increase blood flow
  • align and stabilize muscles and hips
  • all allowing for spinal decompression
  • and relief from his pain

    He took that discovery, applied the knowledge to the creation of a new machine and teamed with top exercise equipment designers to build a machine that works differently than everything else.  The BackAlive machine will give you an option to relieve back pain right at home - and it's available now.  Read on for detail, and remember when someone tries it, they want one in their home as quickly as possible.


    Back Pain is a Huge Problem

    100 million people have chronic back pain, according to WebMD. 

    Paul Olliges applied more than 2 decades of equipment design experience to create the world's first Pressure Active Therapy (PAT) machine.  It's called BackAlive and helps relieve back pain at home.  It's like having an alternative to a chiropractor right in your house and it's easy to use.

    More than 33% of Americans will suffer from back pain during their life.  More than 100 million Americans are suffering from back pain right now.  BackAlive makes a difference.  BackAlive helps relieve back pain and helps them start living as they desire. 

    The inventor and founder, Marty Abercrombie had suffered through back treatments of all sorts and tried every treatment he could find including surgery.  Nothing provided sustained relief.  That led to the invention of BackAlive and after 3 decades of continuous attention to pain, Marty now has increased mobility and a more pain-free life.  His journey motivates him to bring this opportunity to back pain sufferers because he understands the impact to their life.

    Back pain can be debilitating and lead to a major change in a person's life.  Although there are numerous medical and non-medical treatments, a powerful, easy-to-use, at-home machine has been elusive-until now, until BackAlive.

    It’s easy to use.  You don’t need to be on the floor.  You don’t need to turn upside down or act like a monkey.  You don't need to get in any unfamiliar or uncomfortable position.  It's not inversion, and doesn't have any concerns that  inversion has, and it really works. 

    "Ahhh" - that's the most common sound people make when they first experience a BackAlive machine.  It's the world's first easy-to-use back pain relief machine.  The amazing benefits of this simple movement unveil the deep genius behind the concept.  Just slide onto the seat area, grab the grips, place your feet in the foot rests,  and work your back on the split-roller technology.

    Like a massage, you will have increased blood flow, relaxation of the spinal column, an opportunity for decompression, nerve relaxation, and the opportunity for removal of muscle stress allowing improved spinal alignment.  

    For the last 5 years we have been improving the machine and are now prepared to market the new BackAlive to a broader audience.  It's adjustable features allow people of all sizes to get immediate benefits and everyone to work all areas of their back.  But allowing people of different heights to use the machine isn't all we learned.  We also learned that once people try it - they want one in their home - immediately. 

    The best part is, no matter where the pain is, BackAlive can help.  You can  work very low on your back and all the way up to your neck and back of your  head.  There are even more advanced techniques for other areas of your body.  It's a full range machine.

    Unlike exercise equipment, you will have a long-term desire to use this machine regularly,  In fact, most people like to use it daily.  It's self-motivating and a deeply fulfilling activity because it relieves pain, and that makes it an excellent investment.

    This is a great opportunity for you to have a deep discount from the targeted retail price.  We want you to take advantage of this opportunity, but also help us bring the machine to the millions of people suffering every day who can't have a daily treatment.  Now they can have a very serious and powerful option right from their home - BackAlive!

                 Just roll into place                                   Unfold

     

    Adjust to your area of need                  Attain relief from pain

     


    What We Need & What You Get

    Here's where we are and how you can help and benefit: 

    • We've done the research and have tested the machine
    • Created numerous versions of prototypes
    • Perfected the design with our latest BackAlive machine
    • Filed numerous patents
    • Have manufacturing ready to go
    • But need your help for production tooling, and inventory

    The Impact

    100 million and more

    The concept is proven, the design is complete,  prototypes have been tested and manufacturing is aligned. Join the movement to bring back relief to pain suffers. Back Pain impacts up to 1/3 of people during their life.  Join our strong, experienced team.

    • We all know someone who has been disabled to a certain degree from back pain.  It might be you.  Whether it's you or someone you know, there is a need for something that can help provide consistent pain remedy.  BackAlive is  a treatment anyone can have available every day, right in their home.
    • The team is experienced, driven, creative, with a deep desire to bring relief to millions of back-pain sufferers.
    • You can share this information with pain sufferers or have your own at-home BackAlive machine to use whenever you need to take action.  Imagine being able to have an alternative to medicine and medical treatments,  It's like having your own chiropractor whenever you need it most!

    Our Goals:

    Our goal is to bring the BackAlive machine to new markets so as many people as possible can try it.  Once we enhance our tooling, we will be able to manufacture BackAlive machine’s more easily and affordably.  That means we can reach many new markets: retail, wholesale, and medical channels.  Over the last 5 years, while we were perfecting our BackAlive machine, we became very aware that once somebody uses the BackAlive machine, they want a machine they can use every day at home.  Our challenge is to get as many people as possible to try it. 

    Join us in this effort by contributing and spreading the word. We will increase our distribution and enhance our reach to many new markets, resulting in a more pain-free life to many people who have no logical alternative. 

    Spread the Word

    Whether you can contribute or not, please help our effort by spreading the word.  Ask people you know to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

    • Share this information with your friends
    • Email, phone calls, conversations will all help

    Thank you for your effort, anyone who has been debilitated by back pain understands the difficulty of finding something that can help every day.  The BackAlive machine can help many people, and we thank you for reaching out for us.

story:
Kristy's bike was stolen. The thievery! Though she always carries the charm of looking at the bright side of things, her bike was her go-to to get around beyond just work and play.

So to get her back to her pedals and around town again, I ask for your help to donate to getting a new one for her. All proceeds will be for her get her bike and equipment (including a better lock and strategy). (Fun'fully, as a surprise.)

Whether you donate or not, thank you for your contribution to making this wonderful person a part of your life!

Questions about Indiegogo...

The funding will go directly to her. The hope is that if the campaign is successful, we surprise her (party!) and then she can have the funds directly uploaded to her (if I read the rules of Indiegogo correctly).

story:
I'm starting this campaign as a desperate attempt to get my friend and cofounder, Mia von Hyde, the basic tests and medical care she needs.

Mia is currently 31kg (68lbs) and dropping, and she's being turned away by every doctor she sees. She needs help: she needs basic diagnostic tests and appointments with a gastroenterologist -- that's all we're asking for! But the NHS is having her wait for months.

I can't let her lose any more weight without any medical care. She has a toddler to take care of, who needs her mummy.

Please, anything you can will go so far in helping this brilliant and caring woman finally get care herself.

This page is dedicated to her, where you can read more about her story at the bottom, and hear from her friends (including the fellow cofounders of yesireallyamsick.com, myself and Robyn): http://yesireallyamsick.com/invisible-illness-s...

story:
After an unfortunate crash on his paraglider Joey dislocated and broke his left shoulder. Fortunately the doctors did a great job putting him back together (it even took 4 big screws!). Now he just working on feeling better and making his way down the long road of recovery to PT. The heal time for his injury should be anywhere from 8-12 weeks but the financial burden could take much longer to alleviate. Joey works at the hospital but they are not able to have him work for the entire time of his recovery and that leaves little to no way to cover the extensive doctor bills he has encountered. The bills have reached a staggering $5,000 minimum... And that is even with insurance.

In order to lighten this load I have decided to start this campaign to raise some money give Joey a hand and to show him how much we all care and want to see him back in good health and good spirits.

I will be throwing a dinner party at my house for those who donate to show our gratitude. If you would like to donate, but are weary of this site, no worries, we will accept donations at the dinner party as well.

Thank you so so so much!!!!

story:
Biological cell inquiries regarding the scientific evidence on the effectiveness of the tissue regenerating Yang-Naturbalsam (Yang-Natural-Balm)

Yang Nature Balm is a natural product developed by orthopedic surgeons.        It follows the rules of the Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM). The balm supports the therapy in soothing the pain in muscles, tendons and joints. 

Especially with blunt traumas like bruises or sprains, muscle or joint pain caused by arthritis, congestion of the musculature of connective and supporting tissues and resulting swellings, irritations and muscle pain.

The application should assist the therapeutic measures. It does not replace described pharmaceuticals or measures (like physical therapy)

Yang Nature Balm consists of plant extracts based on millenniums-old experience of the Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) in easing pain in muscles, tendons and joints.

Yang Nature Balm follows the Chinese philosophy of the interaction of                   Yin and Yang – the teaching of accordance of body & soul and the positive influence caused by natural materials. According to the Chinese philosophy Yang is the light and quality of life which is inseparable jointed to YIN, the dark and absence of vitality.

The specially balanced and harmonic preparation of Yang Nature Balm increases – according to the Chinese theory the so-called QI, the energy of life and strengthens at the same time Yang – especially with pains in the area the connective tissue and the septum. In addition there is a positive effect due to the balanced agents in the field of intensive care of the skin – in terms of anti-aging-,

  • body’s own regeneration process

  • adjuvant relief of the classic physical medicine and balneology

  • naturopathy

  • sports medicine (Yang Nature Balm is not on the list of doping aids)

  • special terms of therapies including acupuncture, tuina, moxibustion, energy- physiological kinesio taping.

According to the occidental philosophy the healing contribution in therapy and relieving pain is due to stimulation of perfusion in the area of the embrocation and creating a feeling of coldness and heat.

The composition fulfills the requirements of natural cosmetics, it contains no perfumes or preservatives.


Ten frequently asked Questions

Question 1: "Why was YANG-Natural-Balm developed?"

Answer: "The effect of conventional ointments against articulation, muscle and tendon pains are almost exclusively based on the chemical industrially produced materials Ibuprofen and Diclofenac with all their well-known side effects on the overall organism, particularly with longer using. In top of this comes a heavy strain on the skin.

Within the scope of a symposium on alternative therapeutical possibilities in the particular field, orthopedists and doctors of sports medicine decided to produce a specific, especially adjusted, hypoallergenic (non-irritant) ointment with less side effects.“

Question 2: "Why was Yang-Natural-Balm developed on base of the Traditional Chinese Medicine?“

Answer: "The participating doctors followed the aim of an innovative natural product using medicinal herbs with known effects in a grooming,well absorbing ointment base for a long-term treatment without problems.

The TCM can look back on an experience of thousands of years with those agents, but has confined itself  to the so-called 'dekokte', a mush of these healing herbs for extern application. The firm 'aesculapius-RMD ltd. has now brought this medicinal herb mixture into a balm specially developped by the cosmetics research.“

Question 3: "Is Yang-Natural-Balm really a clean natural product?“

Answer: "Yang is a clean product of herbs, although the herb agents are dissolved in ethyl alcohol (subjected to the state control for spirits). In order to reduce the specific smell of the herbs, natural orange oil was added. This ointment doesn't contain any animal products, especially no additives from pigs ( which are added to cosmetical ointments with collagen). That is why this product was certifizised as a HALAL product after a detailed examination in 2010.“

Question 4: "How safe are the herbs imported from China concerning impurities?“

Answer: "Only few, especially licensed companies are allowed to import Chinese herbs to Germany. We work together with China-Medica, a recognised TCM specialist. Every single medicinal herb can be traced back documentedly to its place of origin. After their arrival in Germany all these herbs are examined on impurities, pesticides, heavy metals by a likewise licensed institute. With the evidence of one of these substances the imported goods must be deleted.“

Question 5: "How is Yang-Natural-Balm legally rated?“

Answer: "Y.N.B. was examined by the laboratory PHYTOS, analytics of medicaments ltd., Neu-Ulm, and got the registration (license) as a medicine product."

Question 6: "How well-tolerated is Y.N.B. with long-time application?“

Answer: "As a matter of principle, nobody can completely exclude side effects dealing with materials of any kind. Y.N.B. was tested on allergies by the firm DERMATEST over a long period of time and no test person showed any reaction of incompatibility. The assessment was very good. Other side effects haven't occurred so far."

Question 7: “How long is the shelf life of Y.N.B.? How is its conduct towards germs (bacteriums and fungus)?“

Answer: "As it is an innovative product, there weren't any progress reports in the beginning. On the basis of its composition and its ingredients we assumed a minimum shelf life of one year. At the same time the ointment was tested on its conduct by a microbiological institute in regular periods. At the moment we have as a result the durability of at least three years, whereas Y.N.B. still has been sterile even after this time. An additional incubation with bacteriums and fungus was able to prove that these germs were killed by the ointment, i.e. it is bactericidal and fungicidal. These results provide  good conditions for the treatment of wounds. Tests on the matter are already on the way."  

Question 8: “Is there an extension of the Y.N.B. range planned for the future? Are there any progress reports by patients using the ointment on not yet known effects of the balm?“

Answer: "In the scope of application we have got a lot of reports about additional effects from the patients. These statements are naturally examined. Reports on the application on feet have been obvious regarding  the precaution against pain, formation of callus and smelly feet as well as the prevention of overboarding forming of scarves after injuries and better healing of diabetic ulcers. For these indications Y.N.B. will be specially adapted in a prevailing variation in its composition.“

Question 9: "How do you explain the comparatively expensive selling price of Y.N.B.?“

Answer: "Independently of the financially expensive development, it is because of the high production costs, as there must be made great demands on natural products for the sake of the patients. Apart from the conventional carrying out of legally stipulated instructions, we have imposed ourselves more safety tests within the production in order to keep the high production standard. The production process maintains a hundreds of years old tradition.“

Question 10: "Where and how can I get Y.N.B.?“

Answer: "Y.N.B. can be bought directly at the shop of our website or via email. Consultation by phone takes place all day apart from the weekends. After order our parcel comes to your home within 1 -2 days."


We plan the donated money to invest in several controlled studies about the healing power of our herbal balm prove scientifically. The money is used to fund the salary of a biologist and providing research materials (cells, reagents, etc.) at our laboratory in Munich.

experience of the Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) in easing pain in muscles,
tendons and joints.

natural materials. According to the Chinese philosophy Yang is the light and
quality of life which is inseparable jointed to YIN, the dark and absence of
vitality.

story:
Learning on the Log’s inclusive Summer Camp, has been helping children in Atlanta and surrounding cities to develop their social skills since 2001. Through our supportive programming, we relentlessly pursue meaningful interactions, improving relationship building skills, and enhancing communication skills all while instilling confidence within our campers.

We offer support to children aged 3 to 10, and our camps are suitable for children with a wide range of disorders, such as Autism Spectrum Disorder, Aspergers, ADHD, ADD, and sensory issues. 

At camp, Everybody's favorite activity is River Day, where we gather together in canoes, kayaks, and rafts. This is a unique experience for staff and campers alike, where everyone gets to paddle, navigate “rapids”, play games, interact with friends, and enjoying the peacefulness of our surroundings; right in the middle of a metropolitan city. Campers practice what they have been learning all week: Interacting, Relating, and communicating in an organic setting. We need more rafts to make this summer’s river day sensational!

We are trying to raise $5000 to purchase more rafts for this year’s summer camp. Campers will be talking for the rest of the year about the fun they had on the river, so please help us, get them back out there.

Get the word out to your friends and family, help us raise money for our special needs summer camp

story:
Dear Potential Contributor,

Bexhill Cricket Club is a community sports club located in the town of Bexhill with our home matches played at the Polegrove Sports Ground. We currently run 5 Saturday teams as well as supplying Sunday friendly fixtures and have junior cricket for children starting at Under 9's going through to Under 18's.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise a significant amount of money to have the roof repaired on our cricket Pavilion - more so now than ever following the extremely wet winter months. The roof has considerable leaks and is causing expensive and irreparable damage inside.

To raise funds for this repairs, 8 brave souls have decided to cycle from Lords Cricket Ground to the Polegrove in a day. This journey is approximately 80 miles and will take anywhere between 8 and 11 hours to complete. Oh and they are doing it all in a day!

The Impact

The cricket club is a not for profit organisation meaning that any money we have is ploughed back into the clubs infrastructure and facilities. To put it simply, the club does not have the resources to fix the roof so is raising money the best ways it can. If you can donate towards the cause then please do.

Thank You For Supporting the Team

story:
Short Summary

The San Diego Cancer Research Institute is a non-profit, 501(c)(3) organization dedicated to accelerating the development and availability of cutting-edge cancer therapies, and to improving through comprehensive integrative approaches, the quality of life for cancer patients.

Hope Made Visible™ started 2 years ago under Expressive Arts Therapist Alessandra Colfi, PhD.  Hope Made Visible™ is an ongoing project to engage cancer patients, their families & friends, worldwide, to make flags in a variety of art media to express their strengths, concerns, wisdom, joy, and visions of hope. Patients all over the world find meaningful and uplifting connections by making and sharing personal flags. 

‘Prayer’ Flags have been used throughout history, in different cultures and traditions, as a symbolic means to promote peace, compassion, strength and wisdom. 

When you contribute to this project, you are immediately a part of a meaningful web of support for cancer patients when they need it the most: to restore their resilience. 

Your contribution will make it possible for new patients across the globe to be engaged in making flags and enable their flags to be shown in exhibitions in multiple locations internationally.

What We Need & What You Get

Hope Made Visible™ campaign hopes to raise $ 25,000.

Funds are needed to cover shipping expenses necessary to send flags to be displayed at venues in the USA and internationally; to set up webinars and for travel expenses to train facilitators, patients and caregivers in various art techniques to make their personal flags.

 Funds will cover:

*Art materials

*Shipping costs to send flags to Countries where exhibitions will take place; and to return the flags to their original contributors

*Training of facilitators locally and internationally

*Instructional video

*Promotional video

When you make a donation to this campaign, you'll receive a personalized flag made by our dedicated artists; you will choose if you want your flag to be strung and displayed with all the others at Hope Made Visible™ exhibitions, or if you want to keep it as a cherished tribute of your generous support.

Whether we reach our funding goal or not, we are committed and will continue this project with funds received in making flags with patients, and in planning trainings and exhibitions.

The Impact

The process of making flags in itself is valuable and meaningful for the patients’ lives. Gathering with others, getting permission, motivation and tools to introspect, play and express themselves is relaxing, therapeutic, and unique during the cancer journey. It's not 'prescribed' by the medical community; not paid for by insurance and is usually offered by volunteers. The additional opportunity to connect with others in similar circumstances locally and internationally means to be a part of something greater. To have a purpose even with a debilitating disease, to raise their self-esteem and their spirit knowing others are thinking about them, sharing their journey, and what helped them through their ordeal. At the same time others are uplifted and encouraged as a result of their involvement.

As we have seen firsthand: patients might lose their jobs, their careers, the security of their income, and the loss of family members and friends. They lose mobility, abilities, memory and have the burden of making very difficult decisions while fearful. They have Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD), and often a dual diagnosis.

The arts give them options; a degree of control. Mistakes can be transformed into meaningful images and beauty. The distance to the object/material/symbolic imagery, allows them to gain awareness, validation and to work with their fears and make their hopes tangible. 

This quote encapsulates the essence of Hope Made Visible™:

"Much of the suffering in the world comes from the delusion that we are separate from one another". ~ Shakyamuni Buddha

Hope Made Visible™ participants have completed and sent in approximately 1,000 flags as of January 2015. Sent from the USA, Canada, Colombia, Argentina, Guatemala, Ghana, France, Germany, The Netherlands, Italy, and Australia. More are on the way!  Hope Made Visible™ Flags have been displayed at Heritage of The Americas Museum in San Diego, CA, City of Hope in Duarte, CA, and are currently on exhibit, January through March, at Front Porch Gallery in Carlsbad, CA.

Upcoming exhibitions in 2015 are: April through July in Tubingen, Germany; in October Hope Made Visible™ will be presented at the International Expressive Arts Therapy Association Conference in Hong Kong, through a partnership with IEATA.org and Hong Kong-based Arts in Hospitals. Exhibitions on our calendar in 2016, dates & locations TBA: exhibition at INCAN (cancer care hospital), Guatemala City, Guatemala.

Risks & Challenges

    Hope Made Visible™ started as an idea and over the last 2+ years has been growing and gaining momentum globally; like a movement for hope.

    • We've used social media and networking to invite patients, families and friends to embrace the project and contribute flags and/or donations to help with the movement.

    Obstacles we have encountered:

    • Shipping, logistics and costs, including insurance.  
    • Exhibitions have been set up through outreach, networking and planning ahead; new venues will need to be sought and organized. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Progress in cancer research and care has been made. Yet cancer is so pervasive, and for many patients it becomes a manageable chronic condition, while there is no cure. Everyone is touched by cancer in some way, directly or indirectly. If you can't help financially, even at a modest amount, you can be of great help by sharing our Hope Made Visible™ campaign among your networks and on social media. 

Use Indiegogo share tools!!!

story:
Our Kickstarter project that was over funded by 228%



Click here to like us on facebook


Inversion Therapy 

The sole act of hanging upside down on the sling unloads the spine: thus relieving pressure on nerve roots due to poor postural habits, lack of proper stretching & exercise and the effects of gravity and our own body weight. Inversion alleviates muscle tension, neck & back pain, promotes increased joint mobility, flexibility, relaxation and increased circulation of blood, lymph & energy. It is an incredible anti-stress and anti-aging practice – we like to call it a “natural botox.”

The Yogena™ suspension system is an inversion sling that allows you to suspend in an inverted position with your pelvis and leg muscles bearing your body weight. This position eliminates all gravitational compression. Inversion therapy is the safest, quickest and most effective way to increase the space between your vertebrae. Numerous clinical studies published in reputable medical journals have confirmed that inversion really does increase the separation between the discs of the spine, which brings relief from back pain.


Benefits of Inversion Therapy

Suspension Yoga

Suspension Yoga uses an inversion sling as a prop to help achieve the traditional Yoga asnas, the weight of the body being either partially or fully supported by the inversion hammock.

Our Suspension Yoga training manual includes:

Inversions and arm balances
Approach to sequencing
Isolation for alignment in standing poses
Inversions and arm balances
Seated, inverted and standing poses
Safety and modifications
Partner work
Working 1:1
Language and facilitation
Relaxation – forward bends
Installation
Setting up a class room for group classes
Incorporating the sling into existing practice


What is the Yogena Inversion Sling?

The Yogena Inversion Sling is a patent pending (USPTO Application # 61/853,846) recreational hammock & inversion sling that can be used as a yoga prop, a suspension trainer and can be used indoors or outdoors. The hammock weights only 5 lbs, comes with its own bag and can be set up in less than 2 minutes on any support beam or two points that are strong enough to hold your weight. The hammock is made from parachute nylon and polyester webbing and can hold up to 700 lbs.

It comes with 4 carabiners (strength 12 kN or 2,697 lbs each) and includes 2 daisy chains (4.5 feet each) with 22 pockets.The actual length of the hammock fabric is 92 inches and width is 48 inches. It can comfortably accommodate one person; however, we have also put two people in the hammock and it was ok.

There are plastic adjusters on both sides of the hammock that can be used to adjust the availability of fabric and as such, the hammock can be used as a yoga prop for suspension yoga and spinal decompression. The user can invert 180 degrees in 3 easy steps using the handles to support the user's body weight while inverting.

All it needs are 2 suspension points strong enough to hold your weight. As such, it can be used from monkey bars, tree branches, exposed beams and pretty much everywhere you can suspend it from.

Better than TRX/Jungle Gym

The Yogena Inversion Sling also doubles as a suspension trainer and is better than other suspension trainers like TRX or Jungle gym since its patent pending design includes 3 handles per handle set.

Future Plans

We would like to introduce the Yogena Inversion Sling in a variety of new colors. These would be:

Red fabric + black webbing, Green fabric + black webbing, Orange fabric + yellow webbing, Purple fabric + black webbing

 hammock weights only 5 lbs, comes with its own bag and can be set up in

enough to hold your weight. The hammock is made from parachute nylon and
 polyester webbing and can hold up to 700 lbs.


It comes with 4  carabiners (strength 12 kN or 2,697 lbs each) 
and includes 2 daisy chains (4.5 feet each) with 22 pockets.The actual 
length of the hammock fabric is 92 inches and width is 48 inches. It can
 comfortably accommodate one person; however, we have also put two 
people in the hammock and it was ok. 
There are plastic adjusters 
on both sides of the hammock that can be used to adjust the availability
 of fabric and as such, the hammock can be used as a yoga prop for 
suspension yoga and spinal decompression. The user can invert 180 
degrees in 3 easy steps using the handles to support the user's body 
weight while inverting.
All it needs are 2 suspension points 
strong enough to hold your weight. As such, it can be used from monkey 
bars, tree branches, exposed beams and pretty much everywhere you can 
suspend it from.Better than TRX/Jungle GymThe Yogena Inversion Sling also doubles as a suspension trainer and is better than other suspension trainers like TRX or Jungle gym since its patent pending design includes 3 handles per handle set. Future Plans
We would like to introduce the Yogena Inversion Sling in a variety of new colors. These would be:
Red fabric + black webbing, Green fabric + black webbing, Orange fabric + yellow webbing, Purple fabric + black webbing

story:
Little Angel Maria's struggle with a rare syndrome called Klippel-Feil Syndrome.

Angel was born with Klippel-Feil Syndrome. This includes:
Spina Bifida
Abnormal Vertebrae from her neck down
Scoliosis
Torticollis
Absent Right Kidney
Underdeveloped right Lung
Absent Ribs
Fused Ribs
Tethered Spine
Hip Dysplasia
Smaller right leg and foot

Angel will have kidney reimplantation surgery out of state in the near future. She is getting urinary track infections which are harmful to her one kidney. Every time she gets a fever she must be taken to the hospital and given a catheter to check for infection. Her anxiety level is so high that when she sees someone in scrubs with gloves, she begins to shake and cry. This surgery is going to take care of this problem by taking away the re-flux to the kidney that causes the infection so that she doesn't have to get a catheter every time she has a fever. This is going to be her fourth surgery in two years.

She has a lot of doctors appointment out of state and at home. That has forced her father to use up all his sick/vacation time at work. Angels Mother is unable to work because of all the therapy for Angel and Angels five year old brother Ezekiel, who has autism. The financial burden of having two special needs children is great. It is difficult asking for help but at a point it is necessary.  

Thank you for taking the time to read our story and for the prayers sweet Angel gets.

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone! My name is Conner Kerrigan and I am a junior Music major at Millikin University. I have recently got into running, and have decided to run in a few races in Illinois this year. The first one I will be running in is the Shamrock Shuffle, on March 30th. I would like to take this opportunity to raise money for a good cause that I sincerely believe in. This indiegogo was started so that you could sponsor me to run!

How much?

Here's what I'm offering:

  • My main goal is to raise $500 for the Macon County Animal Shelter. This money will go towards adoption fees, so that a loving family can adopt a dog or cat without worrying about payment. This means that all the money I raise will let animals in the shelter have loving homes!
  • It costs roughly $100 for an animal to get adopted, so $500 will ensure that 5 animals find loving homes.
  • Regardless of how much I raise, I will be running the 8k. But the more you donate, the more excited I get, and the more Rocky Music plays while I train, and the better I do in the race.


UPDATE!!!!! It has been recently brought to my attention that ALL DONATION WILL BE MATCHED DOLLAR FOR DOLLAR BY THE FOUNDATION! That means that if we raise $500, we're really raising $1,000!!!! 


The Impact

This campaign will continue throughout the year as I run more races, but for now, I'm just trying to raise money for the Shamrock Shuffle. This means, that through my running throughout the year, hopefully a dozen or more animals will be able to find homes due to my running. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Run in the race! Here's all the info you will need:

http://www.shamrockshuffle.com/participant-information/general-information/

story:
OUR STORY 

Hello everyone!   To our friends and family that stopped by to read about our fund raising campaign..... HELLO and THANK YOU!!!    For those of you that don't know us, we are Catie Baessler and Jalen Ledoux-Hayes and we are college students attending Point Loma Nazarene University in San Diego California.  We are preparing to go on a medical mission trip to Ethiopia in May 2014, traveling with the group “ipourlife” ( http://ipourlife.org) to provide medical care to the destitute in the villages of Korah and Chuko Ethiopia.

WHY ARE WE GOING AND WHAT WILL WE DO?

In 2012, Catie had the opportunity to serve the people of Korah when she went on a previous medical mission trip with the organization, Visiting Orphans.   During that visit, she developed a deep love for the Ethiopian people and vowed to continue to serve them in the future.  As a third year nursing student, Catie is eager to apply her nursing skills at the medical clinics that will be set up in Korah and Chuko.  Jalen, also in his third year, will be applying his medical knowledge  through his studies in kinesiology, to help in the clinics as well.  Although Jalen has not been on a missions trip, he has a heart for others and is excited about the opportunity to finally put his medical knowledge to practice in this context.

WHERE ARE THESE CLINICS?

Originally built as a community for lepers and outcasts, Korah is one of the most impoverished places in Ethiopia. Here, entire families, widows and orphans are labeled as worthless and reviled.  Many in Korah are destined to a life of misery, still living with curable leprosy.  In this village, 100,000 people are living within a one and a half mile radius, literally on the city dump.  Every day hungry children forage for food as it is being dumped just outside their homes (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f4pgQvgdNqs) They are the “unseen”, hidden away from city life because of fear, shame, and lack of education and vocation. Women and children must travel far to find wood in order to keep the cooking fires burning in their homes, which are tiny one-room shacks where they sleep on dirt floors. 

Chuko is a small isolated village, where it’s beautiful people have recently helped build  their first well….clean water is now available that can prevent the villagers and surrounding neighbors from continuing to suffer from a host of waterborne diseases.  Although smaller in size than Korah, the people of Chuko are incredibly desperate for medical attention.

We are immensely humbled and excited about this opportunity to provide medical care to these beautiful people, and are eager to see how  lives may be transformed from this experience!

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP:

A trip to Africa comes with many expenses and much prayer.  In order to go on this trip we need to raise $3,500 by May 15, 2014.  Any assistance through your financial support would be appreciated.  The money we raise will help cover vaccinations, malaria medications, airfare, lodging and food, as well as to help provide much needed medical supplies for use at the clinic sites.  All financial contributions come with humble gratitude and some even come with “perks”!!

PERKS:

You can donate any amount, even $10 helps. But check out those perks! By helping us fund our trip to Ethiopia, we will make sure to share a little bit of our experience with you!  Whether that is through a personalized postcard,  hand made bead jewelry from Africa, or delicious Ethiopian coffee, we want you to know that your contribution is greatly appreciated and that we are thinking of you from miles away!   It’s just our little way of saying “Thank You” for letting us use your funds to provide life giving medical care to a community of innocent, hurting people.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

Over the next few months prior to our departure and while we are in Ethiopia, please pray that:

  • Our trip will be fully funded!  We need $500 for airfare deposits by March 30th, another $1500 for lodging/translator/food deposits by April 30th, and the remaining $1,500 by May 21st.
  • We would have safe travel and that all members of the team will remain healthy
  • That we will be spiritually, emotionally, and physically prepared for our trip
  • That our team will work well together, so that we may serve as many people as possible
  • AND… please share our story, our desires and our needs with your friends and families!

story:
Be A Patriotic Athlete Today!

"The Fight For Athletic Freedom" is finally here. If you're looking to become fitter, faster, stronger, or healthier, we want you to join SportKore!

When you join our ranks, not only will you be able to achieve your own "Athletic Freedom," but you'll also be helping Military Veterans sustain their own fitness through SportKore. For every person who joins, a Veteran enters for free. Help us honor America's heroes by supporting our Veterans as they work to achieve physical, mental, and spiritual success through fitness. Together, we'll work as a team to accomplish this mission and complete our objectives to prove that we can get more done by helping each other. Become a SportKore Soldier today and together we'll achieve "Athletic Freedom!" #Salute



For Beta Access Orders: After you've placed your order, please send us the email info for all Beta Access accounts at info@sportkore.com!


For T - Shirt Orders: After you've placed your contribution, please indicate your Shirt ID & Size, (i.e. A, Large) here or email us at info@sportkore.com!


We've been working on SportKore for the last year and we've come a long way. We need your support to help bring SportKore to those who are looking to be a part of a worldwide training revolution. With your contribution, we'll be able to build and grow an Army of SportKore Soldiers who are looking to win the "Fight For Athletic Freedom."


So why should you support us? 


  • You'll become an "Original Warfighter" in the "Fight For Athletic Freedom!"


  • You'll build a better body and improve your performance with others looking to achieve their goals .


  • You'll receive the motivation, support, and guidance needed to take your training to the next level.


  • You'll help Military Veterans achieve physical, mental, and spiritual strength.




  

         


Isaac is an Army veteran who earned his B.S. in Business Administration from the University of Arizona (Dec. 12'). Having majored in Management Information Systems and Entrepreneurship, he's now looking to combine his love for sports, fitness, business, and technology to become the next successful tech entrepreneur.

Isaac is now on a lifelong mission to become a better athlete. While working to improve his athleticism, he hopes to inspire others to join him in the "Fight for Athletic Freedom." Sports and fitness are his passion, and plans to use his passion to help other people reach their athletic goals.


1. Purchasing & Setup

2. Buying & Shipping

3. Technical

4. Privacy & Security

5. Additional Questions



1 - Alpha: When SportKore goes live, how do I get started?

We'll be sure to set you up and send you an email with your SportKore login information.


1 - Bravo: I've ordered multiple SportKore Beta Access accounts, how do I activate each user?

After you've placed your order, please send us your email information (for each beta account) at info@sportkore.com.


2 - Alpha: When will I receive my perks?

We will aim to ship out all perks by June 01, 2014.


2 - Bravo: What are the shipping costs?

If ordering from outside the continental U.S., please add $25 to your order for shipping.


3 - Alpha: What devices can I use to access SportKore!

SportKore is a web - application that can be accessed through a browser found on your desktop, laptop, tablet, smartphones, etc.


3 - Bravo: How do I earn experience points calculated!

You can earn experience points by accomplishing Missions, recording training activities, and earning achievements.


4 - Alpha: Is my information secure!

All of your data will be stored on our secure server. Your data is yours to own and you will be able to remove it from our servers at any point.


5 - Alpha: Can I cancel my pre - order!

We'd hate to see you go AWOL but all you would need to do is forward your pre - order confirmation email to info@sportkore.com with a simple request to cancel.


5 - Bravo: How can I reach out to SportKore!

Just shoot us an email at info@sportkore.com, and someone from our team will respond as soon as possible. 


5 - Charlie: How do I submit a feature, training activity, or mission request?

You can tell us all about it at request@sportkore.com!

story:
Wigs for Toyua Duncan

LaToyua Duncan has always been a fun loving, personable person! She loves to laugh and meet new people. You see LaToyua has never met a stranger in her life, because she’s just that kind of young woman. She’s full of love and full of life. Her outlook on life has always been positive. She’s an avid movie watcher, listens to music, and loves just being with my friends and family. On May 42013, she was at work and fainted while ringing a customer at the register.  LaToyua was taken for immediate medical care. Everything checked out fine, the doctors told her that she was anemic, prescribed potassium pills, and sent her home.  Monday, May 6th, the hospital called saying that she had low blood counts, required an immediate blood transfusion, and needed to see either a Hematologist or Oncologist as there were other things to be checked out.  On May 7th when LaToyua met with the doctor, he noticed swollen lymph nodes in her neck, armpits, and spleen.  The Oncologist asked about other symptoms that LaToyua had ignored because she felt they were all stress related.  Some of those overlooked symptoms were night sweats, rapid weight loss, shedding hair, and extreme fatigue.

LaToyua was admitted to the hospital and remained there for 5 days getting poked and prodded. She had blood transfusions, MRI scans, and CAT scans. Her bone marrow was biopsied and a port was placed.  LaToyua was faced with the tough decision of possibly postponing treatment to pursue egg harvesting in the event that she wanted to have children after treatment ended because you see she was diagnosed with Hodgkin’s Lymphoma Stage 4b cancer.  She had to choose between starting immediate treatment and take her chances with fertility later. LaToyua’s chemotherapy treatment began May 18, 2013 and she received treatment every two weeks for 6 months.  Her last round of treatment ended October 18, 2013.  Her pet scans were clearing up and everyone was hopeful that LaToyua was in remission until a November pet scan indicated activity for concern in her chest. 

LaToyua spoke with a specialist and he determined that she was not a viable candidate for radiation treatment.  You see she has family history of breast cancer and because of that it was determined that radiation therapy would not improve her chances of survival.  This prognosis weighed heavily on LaToyua throughout the 2013 holiday season.  No matter what was happening or how much fun was going on around LaToyua; there was a constant fear gnawing in the back of her head. Her fight for life was real and it was now.  On the 28th of February, LaToyua saw her doctor again only to discover that her lymphoma had returned. This time it was in her chest, left side of her neck, and left armpit again.  Her prescribed therapy requires LaToyua to be hospitalized every two weeks for 4-5 days at a time. 

LaToyua is now scheduled for a stem cell transplant to save her life similar to the surgery Robin Roberts on GMA went through last year.  All hope is that the stem cell transplant, like with Robin Roberts, will restart LaToyua’s immune system and rid her life of lymphoma as a constant concern.  Well the most recent chemotherapy treatment has caused LaToyua to lose her hair. While we all believe that she is absolutely gorgeous with or without hair; LaToyua feels even more beautiful with her crowning glory.

After everything she has been through, we would love for LaToyua to have enough wigs that she can change her hair style as many times as she changes her mind. She can’t control the Lymphoma, only God can do that. She can only follow the medical recommendations. We (You and I) can control her wig count. Salon Envy Atlanta has agreed to economically design custom wigs for LaToyua from whatever donations are given for this cause.  Please join me and let’s give LaToyua wigs for her worthiness in her battle against Lymphoma.

story:
Short Summary

Killer Workout= To push yourself to get that extra, when you thought you had nothing more left. 
Right motivation at the right time is the KEY for a killer workout!!

WorkoutMotivator (MyMotivator?) is built with this same idea, to get you the right motivation at the right time intensifying your workout and your workout results.## that everyone of us workout better and with much more intensity when working out with a workout buddy who motivates us to push for that little extra.####
Now imagine how awesome would it be, if we all had a running buddy or cycling buddy ,anytime anywhere we wanted, who's main job would be to monitor your workout progress and provide you with live motivational audio feedback at different intervals, especially in those final moments of the workout when you feel you have nothing left, making you push harder, faster, longer for that little extra thus making your workout a success and not just another run in the park. 

WorkoutMotivator is an mobile application for your iPhones & andriod phones, which will enable every runner & cyclist to have a similar experience as working out with a personal trainer who will motivate you to push harder you to get an optimal workout.

WorkoutMotivator is designed to help runners & cyclist measure their performance and provide them with live audio motivational messages depending on their progress at user defined intervals.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

What We Need & What You Get


So for this exciting project of ours, we need a primary funding of $ 50K which will help us design WorkoutMotivator so that it is most user friendly and brings in the unique running/cycling experience we promise.
With the funding we would also hire professional trainers to record the motivational audio messages the runners&cyclists will hear, which will be a unique experience helping them push that extra bit.
Obtaining an Patent and legal fees will account for part for the funding.
And the remaining part of it will also be used to take WorkoutMotivator to the next level where it can be used for indoor workouts (pushups, pullups, burpees, ..and all that). Without disclosing much, this will feature will come with cool wearable.


The Impact

Often most of us workout without knowing how well we really did,did we really push ourselves to our limits? What if there was someone to keep a track and motivate us especially at those crucial moments when we think we should stop, and instead make us push to get that extra lap or to run extra fast.

Most of us workout better when we have someone to monitor our workout and push us to make that extra effort when we are about to give up. That is what differentiates a regular workout from a killer workout! A workout which makes you feel you gave your 110%. WorkoutMotivator is made just for that, to push us that extra 10% & help us really achieve our goals. 

Help us to help everyone get their personal trainer in form of WorkoutMotivator to get to their individual fitness goals!!

Distinct Features:

Goal Based Workout: User will set a target time before each workout. Aim is to beat that time. 

Motivational audio messages during workouts, for that extra push.Make every workout count. Option to purchase special motivational audio messages in different accents!

MyMotivator Challenge.  (Keeping the discipline) 

Take on the MyMotivator Challenge, which are time based (1 week , 2 week, 1 month) & are available in 3 levels easy, moderate & Rockymode.  Also most of us workout better when we define our workout targets. Its nice to know how much progress we have made towards our target, its what keeps us focused & motivated. WorkoutMotivator is designed just for that to keep us on track by designing our workout targets time based. 

Goal Coach: Suggests new workout goals based on previous performance.

Live track your runs & bike rides: GPS tracking of outdoor activities.

Advanced Reports: Workout is split in intervals to showing how user performance varied at different stages of workout. Mark intervals where there is scope for improvement.

Auto Logs: Auto save entire workout summary over cloud to measure progress.

Ranking: Compare personal best with other users in same city & same age group.




Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

If You Think WorkoutMotivator Can Benefit Your Friends Or Family, Please Share This Campaign Page on:

  • Facebook

  • Twitter



We Are Excited About The Support We Have Received So Far And Encourage You To Back Up Our Indiegogo Campaign So We Can Get WorkoutMotivator Out To The Market As Soon As Possible

Thank You ! !

story:
Please donate to help Shawn Ducharme and Treena Quock

On December 6, 2014 Shawn Ducharme and Treena Quock became the proud parents of Bryce, a healthy baby boy.  Treena had a healthy pregnancy and had no medical issues prior to baby Bryce’s birth.

On December 15th Treena was rushed from Iskut, BC to Terrace, BC by ambulance.  She spent 8 days there and was diagnosed with heart failure.  After she was stabilized she was sent to St. Paul’s Hospital in Vancouver by air ambulance on Christmas Eve.  Treena has been there ever since with Doctors trying to remedy her heart failure with medication, however, it is not helping as much as they had hoped. 

Treena may be having open heart surgery in the near future to implant a mechanical pump in her heart.

Understandably, Shawn is not able to work at this time, and has made 2 trips to Vancouver, BC from Iskut, BC, a distance of 1667km or 1036miles one way.  Shawn and Treena have 3 children including her newborn.  Shawn is taking care of their family in Iskut, BC, while Treena is in Vancouver fighting for her life. 

Please help us help Shawn and Treena by donating much needed funds to assist with their day to day living expenses and their travel costs.

story:
Prince is a beautiful 4 month old baby boy. He suffers from brain tumours and a cleft palate. This is to raise £5900 (approx $8800)  for his life-saving operation.

Prince was abandoned under a bridge, found and taken to the Heart of Gold Children's Hospice in Lagos. He suffers from brain tumours and a cleft palate. Upon visiting the hospice this Christmas we met 63 children all under the age of 12 with various ailments and disabilities, some more critical than others but many of them are being sponsored by kind donors to be taken abroad for urgent medical care that could save their lives. However Prince's case is currently the most urgent and critical.

Prince has no sponsors yet.

His case is currently the most critical as he has two massive brain tumours, one the size of his head, and a severe cleft palate. He cannot move at all due to the size of his tumours, although he is very alert and otherwise healthy. However, medical professionals have determined that his case is operable and has a good chance of success. He has a chance at a normal life if he undergoes emergency surgery within the next couple of months. The procedure will cost  £5500 (approx $8000) (and his transport (with a nurse/carer) to Dubai will cost £530 (approx $8000.


Please help us raise $8,800 for Prince's surgery and start of this year by saving a life.


The Impact

This is an appeal  for everyone who sees this to please share and donate and help us give this child a second chance at life after having had the most unfortunate start.

The hospice is not run by a large charity organisation but by a woman who depends on the kindness of others. Any additional funds raised will go to them to help them take care of the children or pay for the next most critical child's surgery. Here is a link to the website: http://www.hoghospice.org/


Risks & Challenges

If we do not raise enough money in time (he has about 2 months) Prince's situation will become terminal and inoperable. The orphanage is also a hospice and will then have to focus on making him as comfortable as they can before he dies. We don't want that! Not when there's the option for him to live a fully and happy life!

Other Ways You Can Help

***NOTE***:  Please contact me (link in the Team Members box above) if you would like to donate via an alternative method e.g. cash, cheque, paypal etc. All donations will then be posted on to this site by us so you know your money has gone to the right place. Thank you. ***

If you want to do more:

  • Get the word out and maybe try to organise a bake-sale or small fundraiser wherever you are!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Green Mikuna is a healthy food restaurant that provides plates made with andean and tropical ingredients.

Green Mikuna allows you to eat unique delicious healthy plates created with typical fruits, grains and vegetables from Ecuador. In each plate we will show you all the nutrients and the purpose they have so you can eat smartly.

Get ready for a healthier life, Welcome to Green Mikuna!


But.........What is Green Mikuna?

Green Mikuna comes from the word Mikuna that means "to feed" in Quichua,  an Ecuadorian indigenous language. We want to provide healthy Ecuadorian food to the world!

What are we serving

We created several menus that have all the carbs, proteins, vitamins, aminoacids, and other nutrients that the body needs. We do not want you just to eat to be full, we want to provide you with the fundamental nutrients your body needs to be healthy.

So, take a look at what we have created:



Green Mikuna, impact in our society

We are going to provide healthy food to workers, students, and people who due to their daily activities do not have access to such variety.

We also want to help our society by donating a percentage of each plate to several foundations that help homeless children.

We will also be promoting the usage of healthy, exotic, and unique ingredients found not only in Ecuador but also in Latin America throughout our diverse menu. Let everyone know that healthy food can be tasty too!

Risks and Challenges

Our challenge is to create a profitable business model that generates productivity in our country. Additionally, we will have to change the mentality of the people about healthy food to be insipid or boring because eating healthy is what your body needs while enjoying a delicious meal.

Timeline:


Costs We’ll have:

story:
Background

As most friends and family know, in 2005 John was diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumour.  What most people don't know is how this tumour has impacted him and his family.  As a result of the tumour, John lost his driving privileges and was unable to work in the 2 years that followed.

John returned to work in early 2007, but suffered a major setback when he experienced a grand mal seizure in 2009. Since this time, John has been unable to return to work.

In order to manage the tumour, John underwent chemotherapy treatments for one full year.  He has also undergone two separate stereotactic biopsies (taking a piece of the brain tumour) for examination and diagnosis. John and family have endured regular 3 month check-up appointments (in Toronto) in order to ensure the tumour is stable and not growing.

Family

John has a family of five.  Wife Rose and 3 children; Kimberly (24), Ashley (20) and Jeremy (15).  Kimberly is currently residing in China where she is teaching.  Ashley attends Sir Sanford Fleming College and Jeremy is attending Crestwood Secondary School (grade 10).   Rose is also unable to work due to a debilitating ankle injury suffered in 2001.  This combined with a constant reminder of future uncertainty has placed a great deal of mental and financial stress on John and his family, especially since he and his wife are both on disability.

Current Day

In March 2014, John started experiencing focal seizures.  Since then, he has had four MRI’S and continues to seizure. On January 23rd of 2015 John received bad news... His tumour is growing from a grade 2 tumor into a grade 3 tumour. This is resulting in further, aggressive, treatments.

John starts radiation treatment on February 6th 2015.  Treatment is daily for a duration of six weeks.  When done radiation treatments, John will receive a six week break only to then start his second round of chemotherapy for another six months.

Support is Needed

John has lost his driving privileges again, and getting his license returned is uncertain. John will be travelling to Sunnybrook Hospital in Toronto, Ontario.  John wishes to travel every day, so that he can be at home with his family each day.

These are stressful enough times for John and his family without the extra financial burden incurred to simply receive treatments.  The next year will be tough for John and his family and they will need as much support as possible. 

Here is where we can all help!  Take a moment and make a simple donation.  Any amount will help alleviate some of the financial burden.

Please, show your support and donate today!

story:
the hand stuff

        Last winter I went into a plumbing supply store, I looked around and saw that everyone was suffering from dry, chapped and cut hands. I saw it again in the auto parts store and then again at The Home Depot, it prompted me to create the hand stuff, an all natural hand balm that heals and protects dry, chapped, hard working hands. Because its a balm (containing NO water) and its made from 100% natural ingredients, it works better than anything else! 

the funding that we need

  • After selling my half of a natural hair care product line, I was looking for the next thing. We grew the Jane Carter Solution from a home based manufacturing business to a multi-million dollar company that gained distribution in Whole Foods, The Vitamin Shoppe, CVS, Rite Aid, Walgreens, Target, Sally's and Ulta.

  • I have invested much of my proceeds from that sale in the development of the hand stuff, but need additional funding to get this business to gain distribution and make a profit. I have invested in the creation of the business, manufacturing the product, the purchase of point of sales display materials, samples, and recruiting sales reps across the country that have relationships with large retailers like the AutoZone, The Home Depot, Lowes, Carquest, Ace Hardware, etc. which is a long process. We are also presenting to regional stores in many industries that appeal to men.

  • $50,000 will allow us to make the next ten thousand jars of product, create more point of purchase displays and make more samples to build some momentum. 
  • With over 100 sales reps, we are close to our "tipping point".

The Impact

"Have you ever thought about how indispensable your hands are? " Really think about the fact that we feel, touch, emote, and even see with our hands. And through our daily activities, whether it be working with your hands, pursuing your leisure activities, or just exposure to the weather,  your hands take a great deal of abuse. For most of us, they are our most important asset and often times get beat up and they need help. That's why we created the hands stuff. 

No matter your profession, your hands probably play a a big role in your livelihood. You shouldn't have to suffer from dry, chapped, or cracked hands. There are very few hand balms being offered in the market and now there's an incredible solution. 

Risks & Challenges

Because this is not my first time launching a health and beauty aid product, I have a great deal of insight of the challenges that we face. Sometimes, it just takes a long time to get into big store chains, but we have a lot of people helping us get there and helping us get distribution into the small stores along the way. (Over the last week we have opened 10 different small stores and store chains).We already are selling product everyday online (we have an Amazon store) and we're building momentum by engaging search engine optimization and pay per click advertising. Our ultimate goal is to be the official hand product of the NFL,NBA,MLB,NHL, etc. but Rome was not built in a day. We understand that we need to walk before we sprint. Our plan is to grow in manageable chunks. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, why not send us a request for a sample. We will send it out immediately. Then if you like it, maybe you can review it and tell all of your friends, family, and colleagues. 

You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

Even if you can't contribute, why not send us a request
for a sample. We will send it out immediately. Then if you like it, maybe you
can review it and tell all of your friends, family, and colleagues. 
You can
use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
A Personal Note From Angelle....

Through the launch of our sponsorship campaign, we are inviting our fans to join forces with us in a championship quest. We believe the time has come to provide fans with unique opportunities to get closer to the action and the inner workings of an NHRA team. The packages we are offering as memberships to Team Angelle have been designed to provide fans with unique experiences as participating sponsors. You will see the various opportunities in the Perks section. To qualify for a membership to become part of Team Angelle, you must select an option from the Perks list and provide us with your contact and shipping information.

Now back to the story behind our campaign...

When I was asked to return to the NHRA circuit last year by George and Jackie Bryce of Star Racing, the overpowering pull that ultimately brought me back to the track was my connection with our fans. Over the years, I've heard competitors across a wide spectrum of sports tell people they have the greatest fans in world. Having deeply enjoyed the relationships I have had the great fortune to build with all of you, I would challenge anyone in any sport to prove their fans are more dedicated, more committed and more connected than any one of you who has reached out to me through the years. It can't be done, you guys are the best!

I cannot overstate the strength that each of you provides for me as I work with the Star Racing team on giving you my best each time we come to the track. Every one of you serves as an inspiration to me. We want to go faster and be sharper with every run because you are in our corner. A great deal has changed since I left our sport some six years ago, and your support is something we value and cherish.

Like any motorsport, the NHRA circuit relies on sponsorship dollars for teams to compete. Unfortunately in today's ever-changing and still-recovering economy, the dollars for potential sponsors to dedicate at significant levels are far less available for all teams than in the days prior to the Great Recession. Before teams can compete on the track, we have to compete for funding. As always, sponsorships have to be the right fit for the sponsors and the teams involved. At Star Racing, we believe that the time has arrived to change the dynamics involved with funding a race team. We hope you will agree as we strive to provide our fans with opportunities to enjoy unmatched experiences.

With your support of this campaign, we believe that we will consistently race to Winner's Circle and we will be in the hunt for the Points Championship this season. As I said earlier, we also believe the time has arrived to give fans to have the opportunity to get closer to the action and the inner workings of a NHRA team. The packages we are offering to our fans as memberships to Team Angelle have been designed to provide you with one-of-a-kind memorabilia and unique experiences that will take you behind the ropes of our race operation.

As I've said many times, George, Jackie and everyone at Star Racing have put together a terrific team. Our bike is very fast and the program we have in place makes us competitive at every track on the circuit. At this point, it's just a matter of bringing together the resources to further enhance our program and to have the ability to participate in every race on the schedule.

We are ready to take the next steps and we are reaching out to our fans who share the same deep passion and love for the sport as we do. By becoming a member of Team Angelle, you have an opportunity to be a part of changing the dynamic of our sport. The victories we will achieve on this journey will be ones that we will share with you.

I would like you to find out more about the campaign. We have a couple of different ways that you can become a member of Team Angelle. We've designed fan sponsorship packages to fit different budgets. We know times are still tight and we respect the choices everyone must make in deciding how to spend your money. The racing program we have put in place is both economical and highly effective in making the most efficient use of our available budget.

There's no question we have plenty of horsepower on the bike, but the real strength of our team is our fans. Through becoming a member of Team Angelle, our fans will be the true horsepower of our run to the Winner's Circle and the Points Championship. Your passion for what we bring to the track each week will serve as the actual pistons that drive us down the track. We want to be in a position to share a championship experience with you.

We appreciate your time and consideration concerning this campaign. I am looking forward to sharing my experiences with our fans throughout the season. I would encourage you to continue to visit this website for the latest news on the campaign and what we are doing at the track.

We appreciate you time and consideration concerning this campaign.

Stay tuned! There is more to come!

story:
What is TrackR mind?

You know the feeling - you're in a meeting, participating in a group activity or just trying to focus on your work. Suddenly though, your thoughts start to slip away. Your head becomes an empty vessel, devoid of what you were doing, or what to do next. You are not alone. We've all lost it at some point.

TrackR mind is a large, frisbee-shaped device that is easily inserted into your head and paired with your smartphone via Bluetooth. Once paired, easily keep track of your mind so you don't lose it!

We're using funds from the campaign to develop & obtain the parts for TrackR mind. If we meet our goal, we will sell TrackR mind on our website www.TheTrackR.com.

Separation Alerts

About to leave your mind behind? Prevent yourself from losing it in the first place with separation alerts! TrackR mind will alert you when your mind wanders off, helping you with those awkward moments (like when you don't know how to tell your boss that you just backed into his car or forget that it's your wife's birthday).

Last Known Location

If and when you do lose your mind, it's no longer a brainless search. TrackR mind lets you know exactly where you left your mind so that you can recover it with ease.

Time Efficient

Going to the awkward holiday party? Need to maintain your sanity throughout dinner with the in-laws? For those moments when you really need to keep your head straight, TrackR mind helps you keep up - QUICKLY! Go from lost to lucid in under 2 seconds!

Why should I fund TrackR mind?

Your mind is the last thing you want to lose, especially at a critical time. For the low price of $99,999, you can give the presentation of the century rather than fumble in front of your colleagues.

Worried about forgetting your routine for the dance recital? Can't remember your own anniversary? Don't leave it to sheer willpower - let TrackR mind keep your head intact and your feet on the ground.

How does it Work?

Despite it's large size and simplistic design, TrackR mind is actually quite complex.

Should I be concerned about my mind's safety / security?

During our initial testing, we got this question a lot. Our answer was always simple: no!

Why does TrackR need funding for TrackR mind?

Brain Power. This is what drives TrackR mind, and it isn't cheap. With your help and contribution, we can amass enough brain power to bring TrackR mind to the world. After that, no one will ever lose their mind again!

About other TrackR devices:

Website: www.TheTrackR.com

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/TrackRbravo

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/TheTrackR
