story:
In 2014, Chris Waldum started on a journey to change the sports supplement world with Inspired Nutraceuticals. Over the years, Inspired would go on to create the #1 pre-workout in the sports nutrition industry, DVST8. The base of Inspired Nutraceuticals was built on the concept of providing the best supplements and formulas for their athletes and customers. Working with athletes revealed that there was a gap in cognitive advancement, there was not a solid replacement for crash-inducing energy drinks or an alternative to something you buy from a pharmacist. And Anastasis was born.

 

 

 

Corporate CEOs, real estate moguls, Wall Street heavyweights, and straight A students -- all highly successful individuals -- share a set of common traits:

 

  • Relentless work ethic
  • Uncompromising standards
  • Laser focus
  • Dogged determination
  • Clear, defined vision
  • Unyielding commitment
  • Endless pursuit of excellence

 

Imbued with these qualities any individual, not just the genetically gifted, can be a titan of industry. However, missing even just one of these qualities relegates a person to the bland malaise of the exceptionally mediocre.

 

Konnect is the business professional’s daily neurological elixir for enhanced cognitive function, heightened focus, and increased mental acuity. With Konnect you’ll be at your cognitive peak whether it’s first thing in the morning or late at night after a full day of meetings. Gone are the days of wasting hundreds of dollars on overpriced coffee or potentially hazardous prescription drugs.

 

 

Konnect is your secret weapon for maintaining your mental edge, ensuring you’re always at your mental best!

 

The premier form of choline supplement on the market that enhances production of the learning neurotransmitter acetylcholine. Alpha GPC improves mental performance at a cellular level by reinforcing and strengthening the communication between cells. You’ll also experience heightened focus, increased concentration, and easier learning.

 

KSM-66 is a premium-grade extract of Ashwagandha, an incredibly popular adaptogen. Ashwagandha is well documented to reduce stress by regulating cortisol and improve your mental and physical responses to all varieties of physical and psychological stress. It heightens cognitive performance and improves reaction time as well. You’ll also experience decreased mental fatigue that can accumulate from those long days at the office.

 

TeaCrine is a relative of caffeine that provides a prolonged sense of energy, and when paired alongside caffeine, as it is in Konnect, promotes a heightened sense of focus. You’ll also experience a long-lasting boost in mood due to theacrine’s ability to increase dopamine levels in a similar manner to that of caffeine.

 

DMAE, short for dimethylaminoethanol, is a choline precursor that enhances acetylcholine production in the body. Including it in addition to Alpha GPC ensures your body has ample choline stores to synthesize acetylcholine, further boosting information transmission and processing.

 

Derived from green tea, Konnect contains a 175mg natural caffeine -- the ideal dose to awaken your neurological functions without making you jittery, anxious, or over-stimulated. Natural caffeine provides a smooth, sustained release of energy that never ends with a horrendous crash.

 

Eria Jarensis is a powerful plant loaded with several types of PEA alkaloids, most notably N-phenethyldimethylamine. The benefit of using eria jarensis over standard PEA is that its unique structure allows its mood-elevating benefits to last substantially longer than regular PEA. With eria jarensis, you’ll experience an immediate increase in focus and mood that lasts all day long.

 

Derived from cacao, theobromine is an alkaloid compound structurally similar to caffeine, but provides a slower, more sustained release of energy than the immediate surge that caffeine gives.

Theobromine enhances blood flow and oxygenation to the brain and provides long-term antioxidant properties. Pairing it alongside caffeine helps prevent the restricted blood flow and reduced reduces gray matter that comes with daily caffeine usage. Cerebral blood flow is an important marker for cognition, and theobromine ensure blood flow is always optimal.

 

N-Methyl Tyramine (NMT) is a naturally occurring monoamine compound that stimulates the release of several powerful catecholamines in the body including dopamine, epinephrine (adrenaline), and norepinephrine (noradrenaline). This release of adrenergic, dopaminergic and serotonergic neurotransmitters creates a heightened sense of motivation, alertness and focus that simply can’t be matched by any other ingredient.

 

 

 

 

 

Stress is one of the biggest silent killers in today’s society. Stress leads to high blood pressure, anxiety, depression, and at its worst, heart attacks or an early date with the Grim Reaper.

 

It’s a sad fact that most individual’s walking the earth today are plagued by some sort of chronic stress, and with that comes worries, anxiety, sleepless nights, and an altogether feeling of constantly being on edge. To further compound the matter, it seems that the more successful you are in life, the more pressure (and stress) that gets thrust upon you. More often than not, all of this stress leads to dates with a shrink and a bottle of research chemicals that might treat your symptoms but could just as easily lead to even more anxiety and depression!

 

LAX is the professional’s nerve tonic. Instead of resorting to prescription pharmaceuticals that may lead to nasty side effects such as muscle weakness, headaches, memory problems, and insomnia, why not use an all-natural herbal remedy to combat cortisol and crush stress for good. LAX promotes relaxation and fosters a sense of calm amidst the turmoil that surrounds you on a daily basis.

 

LAX isn’t just for stress either. Are you plagued by shyness or a general feeling of being “out of sorts” when surrounded by large groups of people? LAX can be your wingman, giving you the confidence boost you need when faced with a swarm of people.

Party a little too hard?

LAX also works as a great cure-all after those hard nights of partying with the gang. The ingredients in LAX help optimize neurotransmitter levels in the brain to promote clear vision and thought, erasing the “brain fog” that almost always comes with late nights on the town.

 

GABA is the body’s primary inhibitory (“downer”) neurotransmitter that reduces neuronal excitability throughout the nervous system. Supplementing with GABA helps to increase the amount of alpha waves in the brain which supports a state of “deep relaxation”, helping you to stay calm in the face of stress.
 

Used for thousands of years as a foundational component of Ayurveda, Ashwagandha is a powerful herb that works as a natural anxiolytic. It helps the body deal with all sorts of mental, physical, emotional, and psychological stressors. LAX includes the premier form of Ashwagandha on the market in KSM-66.

Developed Ixoreal over a period of 14 years, KSM-66 is standardized to standardized to 5% withanolides, and what sets it apart from any other ashwagandha extract on the market is that the developers maintain the exact same ratio of compounds in the extract as is naturally found in the ashwagandha plant, making for a more natural, effect supplement.

 

Gotu Kola is the ‘equalizer” for the body. It balances acetylcholine levels while also increasing dopamine and serotonin. Also known as centella asiatica, gotu kola has a long history of use in traditional Oriental medicine where it was used to treat various skin conditions including eczema, leprosy, lupus, and varicose ulcers, as well as a number of other ailments such as fever, diarrhea, psoriasis, and fever.

Today, gotu kola has been embraced as a powerful mood elevator / nootropic that promotes a sense of well-being, reduces oxidative stress in the brain, improve cognition, and exerts some neuroprotective benefits too.

 

Found in tea leaves, L-Theanine is an amino acid renowned for its ability to promote relaxation and induce a state of calm. There’s a reason people are always recommending to drink a cup of warm tea to help relax!

Theanine is an ideal stress reliever, that also offers a number of cognitive and neuroprotective benefits too, helping you stay calm and focus amidst the commotion.

 

Phenibut is a GABA derivative that exerts an extremely pronounced sense of relaxation. This mighty nootropic has been used increasingly over the years for its ability to enhance mood, relieve stress, and promote cognitive function. In the brain, phenibut regulates neuronal excitability (similar to GABA), which prevents a hyperactive brain, and it also acts as a GABA-mimetic on the GABA-B receptors, promoting long-lasting calm.

 

Lemon balm is one of the oldest, most popular natural remedies in existence. It has been used for centuries as an herbal medicine to reduce anxiety, improve sleep, heal wounds, and promote longevity. The age-old plant also helps reduce hyperactivity and improves concentration, something that can come in handy during those extremely busy (and crowded) nights on the town!

 

5-HTP, is a derivative of the amino acid L-Tryptophan, the stuff in turkey that supposedly makes people sleepy. In the body, 5-HTP get ultimately converted to serotonin, which heightens mood and combats depression. Supplementing with 5-HTP helps reduce stress, lower anxiety, and improve sleep. If you’re prone to feeling “down and out” on occasion, 5-HTP will turn that frown upside down.

 

A perennial, climbing vine, passion flower is known far and wide for its ability to reduce, and potentially eliminate insomnia, anxiety, inflammation, burns, and ADHD. It’s even been used over the year to treat more serious conditions including seizures and high blood pressure. Research has shown that passion flower may be just as effective as synthetic prescription pharmaceuticals for treating anxiety. When faced with this information, it makes you wonder why people resort to expensive (and potentially harmful) prescription drugs at all?!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Why should I back it now?

This Indiegogo campaign is the first time Konnect and LAX are being sold, so you have the opportunity to be one of the first users in the world to benefit from these products. Not only that, but the discounts offered during this campaign are incredible, prices will jump up considerably after this campaign ends.  

 

Is Anastasis approved by the FDA?

Our products are made in a cGMP facility that is inspected by the FDA. Each ingredient is lab tested prior blending to ensure purity, and our formulas are tested post blending before packaging to ensure the exact amounts of each ingredient on the label are correct.

 

What makes Anastasis better than other supplements?

Transparency. Our formula are kept transparent in order for our customers to research each individual ingredient to see their efficacious dosages. We have nothing to hide. We only want to benefit our customers by providing unique formulas with proven ingredients. Unlike most all companies out there our margins are our last worry, first and foremost comes our customers. If we offer products that truly benefit our customers our company will grow organically.

 

Who is Anastasis NOT for?

Anastasis is designed to help you focus and your drive, as well as help you relax. If you have been prescribed medication for serious mental disorders such as major depressive disorder, PTSD, panic disorder, bipolar disorder, etc., please consult your doctor before you attempt to change your medication and/or dosage. Anastasis is not a intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

You’ll also experience decreased mental fatigue that can accumulate from those long days at the office. TeaCrine is a relative of caffeine that provides a prolonged sense of energy, and when paired alongside caffeine, as it is in Konnect, promotes a heightened sense of focus. You’ll also experience a long-lasting boost in mood due to theacrine’s ability to increase dopamine levels in a similar manner to that of caffeine. DMAE, short for dimethylaminoethanol, is a choline precursor that enhances acetylcholine production in the body. Including it in addition to Alpha GPC ensures your body has ample choline stores to synthesize acetylcholine, further boosting information transmission and processing. Derived from green tea, Konnect contains a 175mg natural caffeine -- the ideal dose to awaken your neurological functions without making you jittery, anxious, or over-stimulated. Natural caffeine provides a smooth, sustained release of energy that never ends with a horrendous crash. Eria Jarensis is a powerful plant loaded with several types of PEA alkaloids, most notably N-phenethyldimethylamine. The benefit of using eria jarensis over standard PEA is that its unique structure allows its mood-elevating benefits to last substantially longer than regular PEA. With eria jarensis, you’ll experience an immediate increase in focus and mood that lasts all day long. Derived from cacao, theobromine is an alkaloid compound structurally similar to caffeine, but provides a slower, more sustained release of energy than the immediate surge that caffeine gives.Theobromine enhances blood flow and oxygenation to the brain and provides long-term antioxidant properties. Pairing it alongside caffeine helps prevent the restricted blood flow and reduced reduces gray matter that comes with daily caffeine usage. Cerebral blood flow is an important marker for cognition, and theobromine ensure blood flow is always optimal. N-Methyl Tyramine (NMT) is a naturally occurring monoamine compound that stimulates the release of several powerful catecholamines in the body including dopamine, epinephrine (adrenaline), and norepinephrine (noradrenaline). This release of adrenergic, dopaminergic and serotonergic neurotransmitters creates a heightened sense of motivation, alertness and focus that simply can’t be matched by any other ingredient.     Stress is one of the biggest silent killers in today’s society. Stress leads to high blood pressure, anxiety, depression, and at its worst, heart attacks or an early date with the Grim Reaper. It’s a sad fact that most individual’s walking the earth today are plagued by some sort of chronic stress, and with that comes worries, anxiety, sleepless nights, and an altogether feeling of constantly being on edge. To further compound the matter, it seems that the more successful you are in life, the more pressure (and stress) that gets thrust upon you. More often than not, all of this stress leads to dates with a shrink and a bottle of research chemicals that might treat your symptoms but could just as easily lead to even more anxiety and depression! LAX is the professional’s nerve tonic. Instead of resorting to prescription pharmaceuticals that may lead to nasty side effects such as muscle weakness, headaches, memory problems, and insomnia, why not use an all-natural herbal remedy to combat cortisol and crush stress for good. LAX promotes relaxation and fosters a sense of calm amidst the turmoil that surrounds you on a daily basis. LAX isn’t just for stress either. Are you plagued by shyness or a general feeling of being “out of sorts” when surrounded by large groups of people? LAX can be your wingman, giving you the confidence boost you need when faced with a swarm of people.Party a little too hard?LAX also works as a great cure-all after those hard nights of partying with the gang. The ingredients in LAX help optimize neurotransmitter levels in the brain to promote clear vision and thought, erasing the “brain fog” that almost always comes with late nights on the town. GABA is the body’s primary inhibitory (“downer”) neurotransmitter that reduces neuronal excitability throughout the nervous system. Supplementing with GABA helps to increase the amount of alpha waves in the brain which supports a state of “deep relaxation”, helping you to stay calm in the face of stress. Used for thousands of years as a foundational component of Ayurveda, Ashwagandha is a powerful herb that works as a natural anxiolytic. It helps the body deal with all sorts of mental, physical, emotional, and psychological stressors. LAX includes the premier form of Ashwagandha on the market in KSM-66.Developed Ixoreal over a period of 14 years, KSM-66 is standardized to standardized to 5% withanolides, and what sets it apart from any other ashwagandha extract on the market is that the developers maintain the exact same ratio of compounds in the extract as is naturally found in the ashwagandha plant, making for a more natural, effect supplement. Gotu Kola is the ‘equalizer” for the body. It balances acetylcholine levels while also increasing dopamine and serotonin. Also known as centella asiatica, gotu kola has a long history of use in traditional Oriental medicine where it was used to treat various skin conditions including eczema, leprosy, lupus, and varicose ulcers, as well as a number of other ailments such as fever, diarrhea, psoriasis, and fever.Today, gotu kola has been embraced as a powerful mood elevator / nootropic that promotes a sense of well-being, reduces oxidative stress in the brain, improve cognition, and exerts some neuroprotective benefits too. Found in tea leaves, L-Theanine is an amino acid renowned for its ability to promote relaxation and induce a state of calm. There’s a reason people are always recommending to drink a cup of warm tea to help relax!Theanine is an ideal stress reliever, that also offers a number of cognitive and neuroprotective benefits too, helping you stay calm and focus amidst the commotion. Phenibut is a GABA derivative that exerts an extremely pronounced sense of relaxation. This mighty nootropic has been used increasingly over the years for its ability to enhance mood, relieve stress, and promote cognitive function. In the brain, phenibut regulates neuronal excitability (similar to GABA), which prevents a hyperactive brain, and it also acts as a GABA-mimetic on the GABA-B receptors, promoting long-lasting calm. Lemon balm is one of the oldest, most popular natural remedies in existence. It has been used for centuries as an herbal medicine to reduce anxiety, improve sleep, heal wounds, and promote longevity. The age-old plant also helps reduce hyperactivity and improves concentration, something that can come in handy during those extremely busy (and crowded) nights on the town! 5-HTP, is a derivative of the amino acid L-Tryptophan, the stuff in turkey that supposedly makes people sleepy. In the body, 5-HTP get ultimately converted to serotonin, which heightens mood and combats depression. Supplementing with 5-HTP helps reduce stress, lower anxiety, and improve sleep. If you’re prone to feeling “down and out” on occasion, 5-HTP will turn that frown upside down. A perennial, climbing vine, passion flower is known far and wide for its ability to reduce, and potentially eliminate insomnia, anxiety, inflammation, burns, and ADHD. It’s even been used over the year to treat more serious conditions including seizures and high blood pressure. Research has shown that passion flower may be just as effective as synthetic prescription pharmaceuticals for treating anxiety. When faced with this information, it makes you wonder why people resort to expensive (and potentially harmful) prescription drugs at all?!     

 

 
 

      Why should I back it now?This Indiegogo campaign is the first time Konnect and LAX are being sold, so you have the opportunity to be one of the first users in the world to benefit from these products. Not only that, but the discounts offered during this campaign are incredible, prices will jump up considerably after this campaign ends.   Is Anastasis approved by the FDA?Our products are made in a cGMP facility that is inspected by the FDA. Each ingredient is lab tested prior blending to ensure purity, and our formulas are tested post blending before packaging to ensure the exact amounts of each ingredient on the label are correct. What makes Anastasis better than other supplements?Transparency. Our formula are kept transparent in order for our customers to research each individual ingredient to see their efficacious dosages. We have nothing to hide. We only want to benefit our customers by providing unique formulas with proven ingredients. Unlike most all companies out there our margins are our last worry, first and foremost comes our customers. If we offer products that truly benefit our customers our company will grow organically. Who is Anastasis NOT for?Anastasis is designed to help you focus and your drive, as well as help you relax. If you have been prescribed medication for serious mental disorders such as major depressive disorder, PTSD, panic disorder, bipolar disorder, etc., please consult your doctor before you attempt to change your medication and/or dosage. Anastasis is not a intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

story:
Sima

Sima was born prematurely on February 25, 2103. She was born with Down's Syndrome and a host of other health issues including a heart defect. The first few months of Sima's life, when most parents are bonding with their new baby and learning what makes their child cry and what makes their child laugh, Sima's parents were in and out of the hospital, visiting doctors and providing Sima with the drugs she needed to live. 

At 6 months, Sima is now at the point where she needs to have open heart surgery in order to correct the defect she was born with. As a growing baby, it is important that this operation be taken care of sooner rather than later, before it can get any worse.
Sima will be traveling with her parents from Russia to Germany where the doctors are equipped to give her the help she needs and to perform the surgery. However, the costs are exorbitant and Sima's parents have no idea where they will come up with the money they need to help save Sima's heart. 
As a family friend, I appeal to you, and ask you to open up your heart and save Sima's. Every dollar will go a long way to a family that simply doesn't have any. Imagine if Sima was your daughter, your niece, your cousin - how would you react then? 
I don't have any major perks I can think of offering, but I hope that regardless, you will show compassion and love to a young, innocent baby who is just beginning her life in this world. 


A Message from Sima's Mother

I received this email just today with a message from Sima's mother and I would like to share part of it with you. (It has been translated from Russian.)

      I can cry and wonder why and for what reason G-d gave me a special child. I can lay down my hands and do nothing; just feel sorry for myself and hide this unusual baby from friends and neighbors, not talk about it to friend and family. I can cry at night and think about how I'm out of luck....

      But, for what?? This is the question that I must ask myself. Why should I make life unbearable when I can just learn to live a new life, one that was unknown until now, a complex, difficult, but interesting life, with the opportunity to make new discoveries, and follow a path upon which I will meet a lot of new, interesting, good, smart people who will understand me?...

       I chose this path and along the way, I have met so many nice people that I would not have met had fate not allowed me to become the mother of a special child. And I believe and I hope that the people I have met will become my friends and that we will go hand in hand together, in our new life.

Anna, Sima's mother, goes on to outline what their routine has been until now and describes the various procedures and difficulties Sima has had so far. 

       ....The bill came and I am at a complete loss. I really hope that I have the strength to overcome it all. And to deal with the collection of the money. Sorry that this letter is long, but, well, this is really what happened. Thank you all in advance.

       Sincerely, Anna


Other Ways You Can Help

Please, please, spread the word. By simply sharing this campaign via social media, we will be able to reach many more people than I would be able to on my own. Sima deserves a chance at a healthy childhood and you have the opportunity to help her achieve that. 

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
HerbiCube 

We believe HerbiCube to be the world's most advanced and practical indoor garden. (we call him Herbie)

It is an automated growing system that let's even brown thumbs grow food right where you want it - right there in the kitchen. Being a soil based system it can be fully organic, or you can use chemically based nutrients if that is your preference - it is your choice.

It is the best way to grow herbs, salad greens and small fruits and vegetables like strawberries or cherry tomatoes.

Herbie's inventor, David Copping, has spent the last 4 years working on better ways to grow food. One of his big ideas is a revolutionary vertical growing system that could help feed the world's undernourished millions. Developing and marketing the HerbiCube organic indoor garden is one of the ways to help bring this dream into reality.

Help is needed for tooling and initial inventory to get Herbie away from the computer and out into the real world. Prototypes have been trialled with distributors around the world and final design changes made. Now we're ready for tooling and production!

Why Buy a HerbiCube?

We've got three words for you - taste, nutrition and convenience. Arrange them in any order you want - they're all there!

If you like cooking, you will know all about the taste difference between fresh and dried herbs. And how many times have you bought expensive parsely or basil at the market and ended up with half of it spoiling in the refrigerator? 

Of course the better taste also indicates how much more nutritious fresh product is - it hasn't suffered through days (or weeks) in the supply chain, or been bombarded with chemical sprays or fertilisers. With HerbiCube - its all natural, fully organic.

The convenience of having the fresh herbs and salad greens you use right there on your kitchen bench is just fantastic. No getting wet in the rain when you need something from the garden.

There are other advantages to growing food indoors - it means you can grow all year round, weather extremes like really hot or cold days don't damage the plants, and of course, there are no bugs eating your precious crop.

It's also perfect for apartment dwellers.

 What's So Special About Herbie?

 Herbie has got a lot going for him, and your help will allow many more people to enjoy the real taste of fresh herbs and salad greens, growing right where you need them - on your kitchen bench.

Here are some of Herbie's good bits: 

  • hi-tech lights assist plant growth, health and taste (with low energy LED's your power bills are lower as is your greenhouse footprint and there's no risk of burning your precious plants);
  • completely organic (no chemical nutrients);
  • compact design (250mm x 250mm) with a unique rotating base for easy plant maintenance and cropping;
  • automated - just set and forget watering, light and nutrient delivery regimes.
  • lower plant costs and choice - you will have the choice of buying either our specially formulated soils and nutrients, as well as convenient seed packs, but if you prefer, you can just trot down to your local garden centre and buy all the gear you need there.

Help Needed

We're asking for your help by pre-purchasing some product to help us get it into production. We're offering great discounts, and the more you buy, the more you save. it's a terrific gift idea, and even works as a community project (volume discounts mean you can resell them as a fund-raiser!)

We have an Indiegogo target of only $20,000, which helps us with our initial manufacturing run. We also been undertaking a more traditional equity capital raising and have nearly raised enough to meet our minimum production. $20,000 from you guys will get us over the line, so please help.

You can email David Copping at dcopping@indoorgardencompany.com.au for more detail on our capital raising if you are interested.

We have distributors lined up all around the world who have seen our early prototype and are waiting to see the final finished product (it has many design improvements on the version they were enthusiastic about), so we are looking forward to being able to give them better suppoprt and to start work on developing our other products.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't buy a HerbiCube you can still help us by sharing this with friends, family, even foes, we're not fussed, just help us get it out there!

The folks at Indiegogo have some tools to help with all of this, and as that helps them to build their brand it will in turn help other entrepreneurs to turn their ideas into reality, so use the Indiegogo tools.

Thank You

story:
ONE WALES - The Great Welsh Rugby Debate

Sunday 27th April 2014 @3pm (tbc)

David Moffett, Former CEO of The Welsh Rugby Union and Millennium Stadium, challenges David Pickering, the current Chairman of The Welsh Rugby Union to a LIVE PUBLIC DEBATE on the future of Welsh Rugby.

The Great Welsh Rugby Debate is the final event of Judgement Week, a series of roadshows featuring David Moffett explaining his Manifesto to rugby clubs across Wales in the week commencing 21st April 2014.

The Great Welsh Rugby Debate is the event that ALL of Welsh Rugby wants to see & hear, and not only can you play a part in making it happen, but also be there to witness this historical event...


What I need & what you get

I need £5000 to hire St David's Hall, Cardiff for the live debate. Every person who pledges money to make the debate happen will receive an invitation to the event which is currently scheduled to take place on Sunday April 27th 2014 at a time to be confirmed.


What if David Pickering doesn't appear?

The debate will go ahead, and instead feature a number of high-profile & well-known panellists who will interrogate me, David Moffett, on my Manifesto for Welsh Rugby, "One Wales - building a sustainable future together".

However, my absolute focus is on getting David Pickering to appear. Can he ignore the thousands of Welsh Rugby supporters who demand he argue his case to continue as Chairman of The WRU?


Will The Debate be on TV or Radio?

Well, that's up to the media! There are opportunities for Broadcast Partners to secure coverage rights for the event; please call me, David Moffett, on 07592 000049.


Other ways you can help me

Even if you can’t contribute, there are other ways you can help:

Ask your friends, family & colleagues to spread the word about this campaign to raise funds, and of course The Great Welsh Rugby Debate itself.

Post your messages demanding David Pickering appear to 

  • @WelshRugbyUnion (Twitter) 
  • www.facebook.com/WelshRugbyUnion (Facebook)

Lobby the Chairman and Committee of your local rugby club to attend.


What if I raise more money than I need?

This a not-for-profit event. Any funds remaining after paying for The Debate will be donated to The Welsh Rugby Charitable Trust, the charity that supports those players (and their families) who have been severely injured whilst playing rugby football in Wales.

story:
Bake Sale for Health?! Isn't that an oxymoron?

Nope! I'm here to tell you that delicious food and wellness can (and should!) coexist brilliantly. I believe true health is about enjoying life to the fullest, no sacrificing or deprivation necessary! And I believe in doing it beautifully. Healthy food isn't just for hippies, and eating well doesn't mean you have to stop showering or dress in sackcloth.

An Art Director by day, I spend my free time researching, making, and eating nutritious, yet delectable, food. My life has always been about surrounding myself with beauty (hence my work in the design industry), and, now, I’m focusing on the artistry of exquisite cuisine and optimal health.

Why?

Over the past two years I've revamped my own eating habits and found more energy and vitality than I ever thought possible. I literally jump out of bed at 5am..and everyone keeps asking me how..and now I'm out to share HOW!

Mission

My goal is to empower people to enhance their health and wellness, so they are left energetic, alive, and able to actively pursue and fulfill on their true passions.

How?

I've enrolled in the Institute for Integrative Nutrition's year-long Health Coach Training Program, in which I'll learn the tools I need to most effectively empower others to transform their health and energy.

What's Needed & What You Get

This campaign is to raise funds for my tuition and culinary efforts of creating and sharing healthful, exquisite food. 100% of your donation will go toward my effort to spread wellness, whether I reach the $5,000 goal or not. Anything raised beyond my goal will go to my continued training and business development (courses, equipment, materials, etc.)

As a thank-you, you'll receive a tasting of my favorite organic, raw, vegan desserts and snacks; and if you're a big spender, health coaching by yours truly!

The Menu Includes:

Vanilla Coconut Macaroons

Chocolate Fudge Brownies

Crunchy Carrot Crackers

Date, Nut, Chia Energy Bars


(all organic, raw, vegan, unprocessed, and made with lots of LOVE)



The Impact

I truly believe each person is integral in changing the world, in changing the conversation around food. Your contribution will help me move toward my big goal of transforming people's health..and the world's health.

Imagine a world where everyone has the energy to pursue and do what they truly love! That's why I'm taking this leap, and that's why I'm asking for your support.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, even spreading this campaign with your friends and family is huge. And choosing one new healthy action this week will impact your life and others! Drink water with lemon in the morning, smile at a stranger, call someone you love.

Thank you for taking the time to read this and for your support.

Love,
Carly


Carly Dintaman lives in New York City. She works as Art Director for the boutique agency Stark Design, creating websites, logos, brands, packaging...and sustaining her colleagues with healthy snacks she whips up in off-hours.

Chocolate Fudge Brownies
Crunchy Carrot Crackers
Date, Nut, Chia Energy Bars

(all organic, raw, vegan, unprocessed, and made with lots of LOVE)















The Impact
I truly believe each person is integral in changing the world, in changing the conversation around food. Your contribution will help me move toward my big goal of transforming people's health..and the world's health. Imagine a world where everyone has the energy to pursue and do what they truly love! That's why I'm taking this leap, and that's why I'm asking for your support.Other Ways You Can Help
If you can’t contribute, even spreading this campaign with your friends and family is huge. And choosing one new healthy action this week will impact your life and others! Drink water with lemon in the morning, smile at a stranger, call someone you love.Thank you for taking the time to read this and for your support.Love,CarlyCarly Dintaman lives in New York City. She works as Art Director for the boutique agency Stark Design, creating websites, logos, brands, packaging...and sustaining her colleagues with healthy snacks she whips up in off-hours.

story:
Hello my name is Michael Marshall, I am a Husband, a stay at home Dad, Army Veteran, and a graduate of The Joe Kubert School of Catooning and Graphic Art. Currently I am training at WWE Hall of Famer Jimmy "The Boogie Woogie Man" Valiant's Wrestling Camp in Shawsville, Virginia.

Like many kids I knew growing up, one of my childhood dreams was to one day become a Professional Wrestler. As I grew older, though I still loved Pro Wrestling my life went into a different direction as I wanted to pursue a career as a Comic Book Artist which led to me joining the Army to pay for Art School.

During my third and final deployment to Iraq I had the opportunity to meet a few Pro Wrestlers that visited our Patrol Base on a USO tour. After a short conversation with Traci Brooks and Jimmy Hart the childhood dream was reawakened. After 7 years of Active Duty service I was Honorably Discharged and as fate would have it, shortly after graduating from the Kubert School my Wife got a job in Virginia where the house we moved into is just 5 miles away from Boogies Wrestling Camp. My dream now is to travel around drawing comics and wrestle, sharing my work as I go.

What We Need & What You Get

Now here is where I need your help. My first match is supposed to be the first weekend in May for the 14th Annual Valiant Cup Battle Royal but due to an unforeseen medical emergency with my wife and her being the only source of income all the money that was set aside for wrestling went to our rent and we ended up falling behind on a lot of our bills. With help from family we have pulled ourselves out of that situation however we are now on an extremely tight budget.

In order to compete in the 14th annual Valiant Cup Battle Royal on May 3 in Elkin, North Carolina I need gear and that gear is well outside my current non-existent budget. The boots alone are $225, basic pants are $75, and pads would be another $100-$150.

As a Comic Book Artist and Illustrator I can offer a variety of custom original art such as Sketch Cards, Portraits, Comic Book Characters or even your very own custom 4 page comic. I even have a few Marvel Comics Sketch covers I can customize to your liking.

In the event that I don't make the full goal I will use the funds for whatever gear I can and make the most of it.

If you like what I am trying to do but cannot contribute financially, please share this with others and help me spread the word. 

My thanks in advance for your time and help.

Mike Mars

story:
Short Summary


Rebecca and I are both former athletes who have always had a passion for helping people, After finding CrossFit and each other we've now become more than just coaches.. we change peoples lives through fitness and nutrition. It is awe inspiring to see the transformations our clients have gone through, we have dedicated ourselves to helping others reach their goals and the rewards are amazing.

Our campaign here on IndieGoGo is to fund a rezoning application that our city requires in order for us to operate at our current location. 

Fitness and nutrition is a passion that we both share and our gift is giving that to others, we need this rezoning to go through because without it we would have to move our gym and as a young married couple who just started their careers we can't afford the move our business.


What We Need & What You Get


We need $2,500+GST for the application itself, plus another another $300 for the signage and other associated costs.

In exchange for helping us with the rezoning application contributors will be able to take advantage of some discounted services that we offer, as well as pick up some super-awesome Primal Athletics swag that is guaranteed to make you look cooler!

The Impact


Rebecca and I were both athletes growing up, and as much training as we did for our sports neither one of us had a Strength and Conditioning coach to help us with our weaknesses. 

We want to be that missing link for the City of Campbell River, the one that allows for kids to reach their full potential as athletes and make something of themselves. 

Of course we have a large population of adult clients and we love helping them get the results that they are after but giving someone a chance to succeed in their dreams is a goal that we both share.

We are working hard to educate people of all ages on the importance of moving their bodies and doing it properly. Our goal, for every single person is to understand best practices behind movement and how to go about maintaining themselves.

Other Ways You Can Help


We understand not everyone is in a position to contribute to our campaign but you can still really help us out by sharing this with other people!

IndieGoGo has a bunch of easy-to-use share tools to make sure you let someone know if they want to get into shape and help out a good cause!

Help us get the word out so we can get back to work changing peoples lives!

story:
Our History

JOGA ASD was funded in December 2014 from the passion for sport of six guys from Rome. Grown up together since high school, time spent more on football pitches than in school, Lorenzo, Dario C., Dario P., Enrico, Alessandro and Riccardo (joined some years later), decide to create a company based on events about sport. With JOGA ASD, everything is based on the friendship and respect that bond these guys since many years.

The season 2014/2015 is a running year for the company with many events organised; from Starcup – Episode I (a five-a-side football tournament), to other activities like Tennis and Beach Volley tournaments. These let JOGA ASD to bring together dozens of subscribers to challenge trophies, but especially to share fun and relax with each other.

This campaign represents a plan of consolidation that JOGA ASD want to carry in order to become a reference point in the roman sport environment and to have the chance to increase its subscribers anf followers with always improved services.

What interests mainly the whole staff at JOGA ASD is to give the opportunity to as many people as possible to use sport facilities and to practice sport in a shared and relaxing atmosphere.

JOGA ASD nasce nel Dicembre 2014 dalla passione per lo sport di sei ragazzi romani. Cresciuti insieme sin dagli anni di liceo, spesi più sui campi da pallone che tra i banchi di scuola, Lorenzo, Dario C., Dario P., Enrico, Alessandro e Riccardo (aggiuntosi al gruppo qualche anno più tardi), decidono di creare insieme un’associazione organizzativa basata su eventi a tema sportivo. Ovviamente basando il tutto sull’amicizia e rispetto che li lega tutti da molti anni.

Nella stagione 2014/2015 JOGA ASD ha portato a termine diverse manifestazioni, dalla Starcup: Episodio I (torneo di calcio a 5), fino a tornei di Tennis e Beach Volley, portando decine di iscritti a contendersi trofei ma soprattutto a condividere divertimento e relax.

Questa campagna di raccolta fondi rappresenta il piano di consolidamento che JOGA ASD ha intenzione di portare avanti per far si di diventare un punto di riferimento nella realtà sportiva romana e di poter allargare il proprio bacino di utenza con servizi sempre migliori. Questo è ovviamente importantissimo per tutto lo staff di JOGA ASD perché rappresenterebbe uno stimolo enorme per dare sempre il massimo e raggiungere tutti gli obiettivi prefissati.

Quello che interessa a tutto lo staff di JOGA ASD è di permettere a quanti più ragazzi possibili di usufruire di infrastrutture sportive all’avanguardia e di dare l’opportunità a tutti di praticare sport in compagnia e di divertirsi in modo sano. 


Our Goals

Talking about goals; the funds that will be raised thanks to this campaign will be invested in:

·  New technical material and kits for our players.
·  Special events like Bubble Soccer, Paintball and others.
·  Upgrade of our publicity (online banners, newspapers pages and flyers)

And, possibly, the chance to offer discounts to young guys that might not afford to pay on a weekly basis for a football/tennis/whichever sport match.

What we offer in exchange is our brand, with posters, t-shirts and many other personalised perks, designed and created on purpose for you. One of JOGA ASD’s main characteristics is indeed the care for the image and the branding we export.

Our strength is our starting point, we have big and wide ambitions and this let us free to carry on our events even if this campaign would not reach the entire goal. It is sure that JOGA ASD will make every pledge in the best way possible, even if these will be only a few. But to obtain all the goals we have established and keep our dreams of sport and sharing alive, we need your help!

Parlando di obiettivi; i fondi che verranno accumulati grazie a questa campagna bimestrale verranno utilizzati dall’ampliamento del reparto pubblicità (locandine, banner online e pagine di giornali), l’organizzazione di eventi speciali (Bubble soccer e altro) e la possibilità di offrire materiali tecnici altamente competitivi fino a, se necessario, avere la possibilità di offrire sconti sulle iscrizioni a giovani ragazzi che magari non possono permettersi di pagare settimanalmente per una partita di calcio/tennis/qualsiasi altro sport.

Quello che offriamo in cambio è il nostro brand, con poster, t-shirts e tanti altri personalizzati perks, appositamente ideati e disegnati per l’occasione. Infatti, uno dei tratti distintivi di JOGA ASD è la cura per l’immagine e il marchio che esportiamo.

La nostra forza è il nostro punto di partenza, le nostre ambizioni sono varie e vaste e questo ci permette di poter sviluppare iniziative anche nel caso questa campagna non dovesse raggiungere l’intero obiettivo. Quel che è certo è che JOGA ASD si impegnerà ad investire ogni singola offerta ricevuta nel miglior modo possibile, anche se ne dovessero arrivare poche. Per ottenere quello che ci siamo prefissati, abbiamo bisogno di voi, e qualunque cosa accada, i nostri sogni ed obiettivi saranno sempre vivi.


Challenges

Our main challenge is to succeed in getting as many people as possible involved in our activities. In order to make this happen JOGA ASD has always counted strongly on increasing visibility and spread our material, both online and on paper, and this campaign will surely help improving that side.

Being a company already existing and in full activity, the only risk out there, and our biggest fear, is to not be able to maintain JOGA ASD alive and, even more, to not be able to improve it. The effort of any single member brought this risk to zero, but we need your help in order to get the push necessary to bring JOGA ASD at an always higher level.  

La nostra più grande sfida è riuscire a coinvolgere il maggior numero possibile di persone all’interno delle nostre attività. Per far sì che questo accada JOGA ASD ha da sempre puntato forte sulla visibilità e sulla diffusione di materiale, sia online che cartaceo, e questa campagna potrà sicuramente aiutare in questo aspetto.

Essendo un’associazione avviata e nel pieno della sua attività, l’unico rischio che si presenta e la nostra paura più grande è di non riuscire a mantenere JOGA ASD tale, e ancor di più di non riuscire a migliorarci. L’impegno di tutti ha fatto sì che e continua a contribuire a mantenere JOGA ASD al suo alto livello, questa campagna potrà solamente darci la spinta a puntare sempre più in alto.


Be part of JOGA!

What we ask is not only a pledge, we will be more than happy even if you could only give us the opportunity to be seen by different people, for this reason we ask to share this project through your social pages so that many people could get the chance to know the world of JOGA ASD!

Quello che chiediamo non è solamente un contributo economico ma anche e solo di darci l’opportunità di farci vedere, per questo chiediamo di condividere questo progetto con quante più persone possibili attraverso i nostri social e sito web e permettere a tutti di conoscere il mondo di JOGA ASD!


Thank you!
Grazie! 


JOGA - Sport is The Way

story:
Jenspoowezy really Gives a Crap


What is JENSPOOWEZY?

Jenspoowezy is a revolutionary new health product specifically designed to assist you with starting each day with your feet up. It raises your awareness to a major health issues like Bowel Cancer, its unique design recognizes that a person’s innate recuperative power is controlled by the nervous system and that there is a direct relationship between structural and neurological function. And through its daily practice its builds strong mussel memory that may aid and benefit you throughout your lifetime.



Who is Jen?

Jen Sackley is the inventor of Jenspoowezy Product; she is an original thinker, leader, a creative entrepreneur and life changer. She uses scientifically based theories that support positive human behavioral change.

She is the founder of Sackley Holdings Pty Ltd which has a single focus: to help individuals, create motivational change so that they can create vibrant lives with a sense of well being, purpose and productivity.


Why will this work when others have not?

Because there has never been a Jenspoowezy before, it is the world’s first. Furthermore with Bowel Cancer noted as responsible for affecting the health of 1 in every 3 persons in Australia each year the time is right. Jenspoowezy believes that this innovative product with your campaign support has the potential to revolutionize the way people think and practice their daily toileting habits.

There is no doubt in Jens mind Jenspoowezy’s impact when supported correctly may be equal to the impact initially created by the introduction of the toothbrush.

Having your support on this campaign means this product will be developed on Jens watch, guaranteed to retain its integrity in every stage of production.

Our Story, a product originally specifically designed for Jen. Now Jen wants you to have it too.

After suffering a workplace injury Jen found she could not toilet herself like before. It was recommended medically to Jen she adopt the correct position.

What’s that you ask? Most people don’t know and those that have heard don’t practice it as there is no Jenspoowezy out there.

When Jen suffered she looked everywhere for a toiletry footrest, there were some products that were just not correct, some that were not comfortable to use especially if one is aging but most of all not one other product was designed to support and stimulate the feet correctly.

So with this in mind contributions and discussions with both Jens Doctors and health providers, a designer cabinet maker was sort. Jenspoowezy was created in timber and finished with a lovely polish. It suited Jens bathroom it was discreet easy to keep clean etc.



You’re Campaign with Jen

Jen needs your support to bring this product to market.

1.  It needs to be reproduced in a medically acceptable grade of plastic, easy to clean and much more hygienic for everyone.

2.  Its needs to be lighter then the timber product so to assist with cost such as (P&H)

3.  It needs to meet customs requirements for export etc.

4.  It needs to be flat-packed so were ever you go you are always able to practice healthy habits.

5.  Last but not least by making the product this way it becomes affordable to everyone. $$

6.  Once flat-packed retailers and pharmacies will be able to stock and promote the product.


The impact

Jenspoowezy recognizes that we need not only to eat healthy and drink lots of water rather the benefits of being regular are well documented yet many Australian lives are lost due to diseases of the digestive system.

There is empirical evidence that suggest that elevating your feet during elimination is healthier, furthermore that the modern day toilet is convenient but definitely not perfect.

Jenspoowezy Toiletry Footrest presents us with a natural option raising our awareness that our bowel and bladders are creatures of habit and therefore by utilising the Jenspoowezy Toiletry Footrest, which is ergonomically designed to elevate and position our legs and feet correctly, allows for greater hip flexion and the straightening out of the anorectol angle of the bowel, we will promote easier elimination and efficiency to empty the bowel and bladder of body waste.   

A funny but seriously life enhancing health product:

It has been projected that more than 4.6 million Australians suffer from health conditions that could benefit from a Jenspoowezy Toiletry Footrest and with support of Jenspoowezy Toiletry Footrest. This unique and innovative health product with your support could become the corner stone and creation of the future health of many Australians.

Jenspoowezy Toiletry Footrest can support our health enhancements and quality of life this shift can be significant on a national scale.

Decrease chances of getting Cancer with prevention

Oncologists have observed that 80% of colon cancers occur in the caecum and the sigmoid colon, the two areas that are not fully evacuated in the sitting posture. This causes fecal stagnation and probably explains why colon cancer is the second leading cause of cancer deaths in the Australia and the United States.

So why not start every day in the best position.


Jenspoowezy can also assist persons who suffer from:

  • Constipation
  • Prolapses ( uterus or rectum)
  • Prostate
  • Recent illness/ post operative surgery
  • Pregnancy – Child birth
  • Neurological disorders/ disease
  • Seniors/ Aged care
  • And more..

Campaign to Shelf.

Due to the interest in this product from people with a need Jen has been in negotiations for several months with a reputable design manufacturer. This manufacture has a proven track record with previous and current production of similar quality medically acceptable products in the market. The product will be developed in Australia in the first instance allowing for close supervision of all quality control processes.

·  Launch campaign December 2013 make lots of new campaign friends and connections.

·  February 2014 confirm all contracts and finial designs are signed off and ready for engineering of mold to be agreed upon.

·  March 2014 mold development underway of first prototype, finalize and proceed to full scale manufacturing. Seek and establish contracts with retailers of pharmaceutical supplies and other health agencies to retail products gather orders. Target market contracts.

·  Mid May 2014 confirm with manufacture all production and distribution satisfaction.

·  June 2014 roll out new product and meet sales orders. Build on earlier marketing campaign.

·  Jen will be involved with marketing as the face of the new product with establishing the product.

As the developer and creator of Jenspoowezy Toiletry Footrest I have spent many hours on this product between design and building strong relationships from ourselves to the market place. It makes me sad some days when I reflect on my personal journey with this injury and some days I still cry a little but I am stronger for your support and ready to work very hard in bringing this to fruition with you. Nothing would make my heart sing more than just knowing someone suffering was benefiting from using our Jenspoowezy toiletry Footrest. Nothing would be greater than to see our logo on golfers hats come National Bowel Cancer day.

And one day soon seeing that little logo reminding us all that this is the correct position to evacuate our body waste and raise awareness to healthy Bowel health.

I thank you from the top of my heart because that is your place on this campaign.

I know I cannot do this without your support, and encourage you can to send this message and link to as many people as you can.

Every one of us knows someone who knows someone who is suffering.

Thank you.

Jenspoowezy really Gives a CrapWhat is JENSPOOWEZY? 
Jenspoowezy
is a revolutionary new health product specifically designed to assist you with
starting each day with your feet up. It raises your awareness to a major health
issues like Bowel Cancer, its unique
design recognizes that a person’s innate recuperative power is controlled by the
nervous system and that there is a direct relationship between structural and
neurological function. And through its daily practice its builds
strong mussel memory that may aid and benefit you throughout your lifetime. 
Who is Jen?Jen Sackley is the inventor of Jenspoowezy
Product; she is an original thinker, leader, a creative entrepreneur and
life changer. She uses scientifically based theories that support positive
human behavioral change.
She is the founder of Sackley Holdings Pty Ltd
which has a single focus: to help individuals, create motivational change so
that they can create vibrant lives with a sense of well being, purpose and
productivity.
Why will this work when others have not? 
Because there has never been a Jenspoowezy before, it
is the world’s first. Furthermore with Bowel Cancer noted as responsible for
affecting the health of 1 in every 3 persons in Australia each year the time is
right. Jenspoowezy believes that this innovative product with your campaign
support has the potential to revolutionize the way people think and practice
their daily toileting habits.
There is no doubt in Jens mind Jenspoowezy’s impact
when supported correctly may be equal to the impact initially created by the introduction
of the toothbrush. 
Having your
support on this campaign means this product will be developed on Jens watch, guaranteed
to retain its integrity in every stage of production. 
Our Story, a product originally specifically designed for Jen. Now Jen
wants you to have it too.
After suffering a workplace injury Jen found she could
not toilet herself like before. It was recommended medically to Jen she adopt
the correct position.
What’s that you ask? Most people don’t know and those that have
heard don’t practice it as there is no Jenspoowezy out there.
When Jen suffered she looked everywhere for a toiletry
footrest, there were some products that were just not correct, some that were
not comfortable to use especially if one is aging but most of all not one other
product was designed to support and stimulate the feet correctly.
So with this in mind contributions and discussions with
both Jens Doctors and health providers, a designer cabinet maker was sort. Jenspoowezy was created in timber and finished
with a lovely polish. It suited Jens
bathroom it was discreet easy to keep clean etc. 
You’re Campaign
with Jen 
Jen needs your support to bring this product to market. 
1.  It needs to be reproduced in a
medically acceptable grade of plastic, easy to clean and much more hygienic for
everyone. 
2.  Its needs to be lighter then the
timber product so to assist with cost such as (P&H)
3.  It needs to meet customs requirements
for export etc. 
4.  It needs to be flat-packed so were
ever you go you are always able to practice healthy habits. 
5.  Last but not least by making the
product this way it becomes affordable to everyone. $$
6.  Once flat-packed retailers and pharmacies
will be able to stock and promote the product. 
The impact
Jenspoowezy recognizes that we need not only to eat
healthy and drink lots of water rather the benefits of being regular are
well documented yet many Australian lives are lost due to diseases of the
digestive system. 
There is
empirical evidence that suggest that elevating your feet during elimination is
healthier, furthermore that the modern day toilet is convenient but definitely
not perfect. 
Jenspoowezy Toiletry
Footrest presents us with a natural option raising our awareness that our bowel
and bladders are creatures of habit and therefore by utilising the Jenspoowezy
Toiletry Footrest, which is ergonomically designed to elevate and position our
legs and feet correctly, allows for greater hip flexion and the straightening
out of the anorectol angle of the bowel, we will promote easier elimination and
efficiency to empty the bowel and bladder of body waste.   
A funny
but seriously life enhancing health product:
It has been projected that
more than 4.6 million Australians suffer from health conditions that could
benefit from a Jenspoowezy Toiletry Footrest and with support of Jenspoowezy Toiletry
Footrest. This unique and innovative health product with your support
could become the corner stone and creation of the future health of many
Australians. 
Jenspoowezy Toiletry
Footrest can support our health enhancements and quality of life this shift can
be significant on a national scale.
Decrease chances of getting Cancer with
prevention
Oncologists have observed that 80% of colon cancers occur in the caecum and
the sigmoid colon, the two areas that are not fully evacuated in the sitting
posture. This causes fecal stagnation and probably explains why colon cancer is
the second leading cause of cancer deaths in the Australia and the United
States.
So why not start every day in the best position. 
Jenspoowezy can also assist persons who
suffer from:



Constipation
Prolapses ( uterus or rectum)
Prostate




Recent illness/ post operative surgery
Pregnancy – Child birth
Neurological disorders/ disease




Seniors/ Aged care
And more..


Campaign to Shelf.

Due to the interest in this product from people with a
need Jen has been in negotiations for several months with a reputable design
manufacturer. This manufacture has a proven track record with previous and
current production of similar quality medically acceptable products in the

Australia in the first instance allowing for close supervision of all quality

story:
A Truly Integral Space for a Community that Keeps Waking-Up and Growing-Up in Service of a Better World

Our community was started by people who care deeply about connection and relationship--as a path to better lives, and ultimately to inspiring a healthier world. It's a radically simple view: more loving people create more loving families and neighbors, which creates more loving communities, more loving cities, and ultimately a more loving world.  It may sound simple, but like most essential truths it's not as easy as it sounds and relationship is the place where our least loving and aware tendencies get highlighted *fast*.

Who We Are

The Integral Center is a community of people engaging practices that focus on our relationships with each other. Our belief is that when we learn to really connect with others, beyond our stories, fears, withholds, projections, and judgements--magic happens.  When our teachers, social workers, and all those people most susceptible to 'compassion fatigue', get a weekend with us to hit the reset button (by donation), they're often recharged and ready to go back out in the trenches, with all their unique specialties, to do what most needs to be done.

This community has grown from a vision and people practicing in their own living rooms to a fully organized center, with weekend-long intensives, training programs, game nights, and open-door practices for anyone interested in taking a deeper dive into their community (and themselves). Our members include entrepreneurs and healers, artists and students, business leaders and entire families.

Why We Need Your Help

We were one and a half years into our lease when we got hit hard by the epic Colorado floods in September. The pipes in our building backed up and filled our first level (7000 square feet, half of our entire space) with toxic water and sewage. The water destroyed all the flooring, carpeting, furnishings, plumbing, boiler and other property on that level. To make things more complicated, our insurance policies denied us without even looking and forced us into a back and forth battle with no end in sight.

    

    


The Truth Revealed in Crisis

Immediately following this historic natural disaster, we were flooded with support from our members and friends with hundreds of hours of help removing the sewage-soaked carpet, furniture, and a lot more.  So much so that the building owner and mitigation crew were astounded by the response.  

We kept hearing, "I've never seen anything like this before..." referring to the quantity and quality of support that was showing-up to roll-up their sleeves and get messy to help the recovery of this beloved space dedicated to gathering and growth.  This was evidence to all that we truly have something special here that many care about a LOT. But shovels and strong arms can only do so much. The building sustained damages in the 6-figures, and our entire ground floor will need to be rebuilt, from the floors up. 

We need your help so we can reconstruct our building and bring ourselves into even deeper relationship with our space and each other.


Community Reconstruction for New Services and Outreach

If we meet our goal, we'll have the funds we need to support a community rebuild that will not only renew our space, but also bring us into deeper relationship with the building, each other, and the greater community as we ask for support and share what we care about.

Our fundraising priorities cover the following reconstruction activities:

  • Rebuilding three bathrooms that were destroyed
  • Flooring/Carpeting over 4000 square feet of stairs and floors
  • Reflooring our 1500 square foot dance/embodiment studio
  • Reframing and hanging new drywall in at least seven rooms
  • Building-out new rooms that will provide office space for members and community events
  • Rebuilding our kitchen with flooring, cabinets and counters
  • Furniture to replace what was destroyed

And if we surpass our base, our stretch goals include:

  • A new bathroom and shower for our west side
  • Rebuilding our video studio
  • Additional staff resources to help us further organize and optimize our offerings
  • An outdoor patio (that Jeff was planning on adding before the flood hit)


Why it Matters: Our Vision and 
Our Greater Global Community

Through this campaign, we're excited to share the principles and vision of our practice-based community.  It's all rooted in Integral Philosophy--based on the work of author and philosopher Ken Wilber, and the work of the Integral Institute community.

Integral theory is an all-inclusive framework that draws on the key insights of the world’s greatest knowledge traditions. The awareness gained from drawing on all truths and perspectives allows the Integral thinker to bring new depth, clarity and compassion to every level of human endeavor — from unlocking individual potential to finding new approaches to global-scale problems.

Through the course of this campaign, we'll be updating backers with interviews with some of our most prominent community members and teachers talking about our core principles and vision for how we want to live better lives and be of greater service to the world.

Topics we'll be covering in the interviews:

  • How a more Integral view can support all aspects of your life
  • Community as the New Currency
  • Circling: the Integral relational practice for deeper understaning of self and other
  • Relationship as a Path
  • Best Practices for Better Relationships
  • The Integral Story and Vision
  • The Importance of Practice for Individual and Community Development


The Rewards - How Your Donations Go Beyond Just Helping Us Rebuild

By supporting the Integral Center through this recovery period, you're helping us with our mission in many different ways.  The funds will not only help to rebuild the center and allow us to take our organization to the next level of success and sustainability, it will also create more opportunities for people in the community to do the work they're inspired to do through scholarships and pledges.  Our rewards are designed with all this in mind, so our backers know that they're having a multi-dimensional impact and significantly furthering Integral awareness.

$5 - Big Thanks! PLUS our Valuable Updates

Every dollar counts, so thank you for your support!  AND, we're going to be sending you some of our best ideas via the updates and interviews through this campaign.

$35 - Invitation to our Backer Party

We'll be hosting a party for all of those who have helped the Integral Center grow stronger through this endeavor.  At this level and above, you're invited.

$50 - Limited Edition Integral Angel T-Shirt

Supporting us at this level, you'll receive a limited edition "Integral Angel" T-shirt that we're designing just for this campaign.

$75 - T-Shirt, Sticker, & Dog-Tag

You get the limited edition T-Shirt, plus an Integral Center Sticker, Dog-Tag, and 5 coupons for access to Integral Center classes.

$100 - 30 Minutes of Loving Attention

We all need some quality attention from time to time.  Backers at this level get at least 30 minutes of undivided, Integrally-informed attention from an Integral Center member who has donated their time.  This is a great way to connect with our community and give yourself some much deserved space.

$120 - 30 Minutes of Loving Attention & T-Shirt, Dog Tag, and Sticker

Backers at this level get the Integral Angel T-Shirt, Sticker, Dog-Tag, coupons for IC classes; AND at least 30 minutes of undivided, Integrally-informed attention from an Integral Center member who has donated their time.

$200 - A Gift from a Member of the Integral Center Community

Members of the Integral Center community have decided to donate products and services to help this campaign be successful.  In the Rewards section a bit further down this page, you can see the list of these offerings.  Backers at this level get to choose one of these offerings they'll receive for their contribution.

Here's what's currently being offered:

  • 90min Private Tutoring Session on Integral Theory or General Coaching
    with Robert MacNaughton (2 of 3 remaining)
  • 2hr Parenting Coaching Session with Lauren Barnett  (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Money Map to Freedom Program from Alexis Neely ($997 Normally)
  • 90min Private iRest Session (and Recording)--an evidence-based practice for improving sleep and reducing stress with Ren Resch (2 of 2 remaining)
  • Chiropractic Adjustment for you and your pet with Jason Orowitz (2 of 2 remaining)
  • 90min Relationship Coaching Session with Jayson Gaddis (value $225) (0 of 1 remaining)
  • 1hr Massage with Sheena Creed (1 of 1 remaining)
  • 1hr Coaching session on building authentic community with Sara Ness (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Acupuncture Session with Custom Herbal Formula with Marco Lam (1 of 3 remaining)
  • Chiropractic Session with Dr. Richard Kronen (3 of 3 remaining)
  • 1hr Enneagram Consultation by skype with Josh Levin (2 of 2 remaining)
  • Home Aesthetic Consult with Erin Needham - Need someone to help you arrange and decorate your home in a way that supports your mental and spiritual health? Erin can evaluate your home décor and develop a plan that will align your home space with artistic appeal and functional utility on nearly any budget. (1 of 1 remaining)
  • 1.25 Hour Leadership or Business Coaching Session by Skype with Jason Gore jasongore.com (Value $600) (1 of 1 remaining)
  • One 2-hour Business Consultation session with Jack Spivak: Business Consultation: Visioning, Strategic Planning, Strategic Messaging. (1 of 2 remaining)
  • One hour high level Business Consulting with Steven Ringelstein (value $1000) (0 of 1 remaining)
  • One session (phone/in-person) on "The Power of Pausing - A Truth-Speaking Practice for Women" with Jess Nichol
  • Set of 2 Eating Psychology coaching sessions with Kimba Kjolhede (1 of 1 remaining)
  • 90min massage with Merideth McNown (1 of 1 remaining)
  • 3 hours of massage, acupuncture, and integrated personal training with David Moore.  Can be used all at once or split into 3 sessions. (0 of 1 remaining)
  • Set of 3 Integral Polarity Therapy sessions with Maya Hill (2 of 2 remaining)
  • 2 hours of green building consulting with Mark Bloomfield (Expertise in energy efficiency, net zero homes, building science, indoor air quality, residential mechanical systems) (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Set of 3 hour-long Breema bodywork sessions with Jamie Furstoss Lam (1 of 1 remaining)
  • One couples coaching session with Sujana Palazzo (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Set of two 1-hour psychotherapy sessions with Reuvain Bacal (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Women's yoga kit (2 75-minute videos) and women's meditation kit (6 downloadable audios) from Sara Avant Stover (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Original art by Bryce Widom  (3 of 3 remaining)
      -  #1   http://bit.ly/UFTX1q
      -  #2   http://bit.ly/UFTTik
      -  #3   http://bit.ly/SNa0si
  • 90min NLP Changework Coaching session with Kendra Current (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Set of 2 hour-long productivity coaching sessions with Mihai Banalescu (0 of 1 remaining)
  • Private yoga/movement/meditation session with Brooke McNamara (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Circling training session with Ryu Koyama (1 of 1 remaining)
  • Web content consultation with Keith Martin-Smith. This would include a phone call/meeting about someone's online brand, and some specific content suggestions and rewrites for improving their offering. (1 of 1 remaining)

$300 - Entry or Scholarship to our New Year's Practice Gathering: 
Scenius, Dec 28th - Jan 1st

At the end of this year, many members of our community--local and global--will be joining us for 4 days of practice and celebration, Integral style.  Led by Integral Center lead teachers, Diane Musho Hamilton and Decker Cunov, this party is not to be missed.  By contributing at this level, you get a discounted entry ($495 full price) to this year's Scenius for yourself, as a gift, or to sponsor a full scholarship for someone who wouldn't normally be able to attend.  Read more about the event here.

$500 - Entry or a Sponsored Scholarship to our flagship training:
Aletheia ~ Integral Relating Intensive, for half the normal price

Our flagship practice weekend in Boulder gives every participant an opportunity to benefit from and learn our Integral relating practice, circling.  The success of this training was one of the reasons we were able to grow to where we are today.  By contributing at this level, you're welcome to join any of our upcoming Aletheia weekends (normally $995), give it as a gift, or have a full scholarship available in your name for an applicant that wouldn't normally be able to attend.  Aletheia trainings weekends are four times per year.  Learn more about Aletheia here.

 

$750 - Discounted Year Long Membership for You or as a Sponsored Scholarship

A 12-month membership to the Integral Center for you, as a gift, or as a scholarship sponsored in your name. Being a member of the Integral Center in Boulder gives premium access to all of our classes on top of many other benefits. More importantly than that, it allows you to be immersed in a community of people who want to wake-up and grow-up together; this is the best way we know to optimize personal growth and development.  Membership is normally $85/month.  Learn more about Integral Center Membership here.

$1000 - Join a Year-Long Advisory Circle with Monthly Conference Calls

Want to ensure the job is getting done and your perspectives are integrated? For all of 2014, you'll join private monthly calls with principles of the Integral Center to evolve and further integrate the vision and business plan. Like an Integral share-holder meeting, we'll review finances, project metrics, partnerships, and anything else necessary to make sure we're on track with your help.

$3000 - Day-long "Inner Journey" with Decker Cunov (Limited to 3, 2 remaining)

This is a special opportunity to have a day-long private session with Integral Center lead teacher, Decker Cunov and two other participants.

$5000 - A Private, Small-group Meeting with Ken Wilber (Limited to 10)

A private, small-group meeting with Ken Wilber at his loft in Denver to discuss the Integral vision and more. This is a very rare opportunity to meet with the author and philosopher that all of Integral theory and practice stands on the shoulders of. We'll determine dates based on what's best available for the group.

$10000 - Your Choice

Angels of this high order get to choose one from the following:

  • Full access and use of the Integral Center for a weekend to host whatever you want.
  • A weekend in Boulder spent however you want. We'll be your hosts to practice, party, philosophize, etc.
  • We'll organize a private day-long circling event for a group of your choice: family, coworkers, friends, etc.
  • A community service project of your choice in Boulder.  We'll gather a group of IC members and go to work for a day or so on a project you choose or we find on your behalf.


The Impact - More Care and Consciousness, Role-Modeled Locally, Enabling Greater Care and Consciousness Globally

The money raised in this campaign will go directly to rebuilding our center and improving our ability to resource our community locally and beyond.  The success of this campaign will not only enable us to rebuild our building, but it will strengthen our community and all the lives it touches.   This isn't just about a physical space, it's about the intentions that this space holds, which is capable of helping the world.

 If we reach our goal, we’ll be able to rebuild and improve what we had before AND build-out new additions that will support the community's health and sustainability for years to come.  We'll have space to create a beautiful new embodiment studio, build a commercial kitchen for community meals, and new office spaces for member rentals. Rebuilding our space allows us to host more community events and enable even greater levels of community fitness and maturity -- healthier relationships, broader sharper minds, emotional maturity, and deeper consciousness.  Our community is enriched and nourished by the wide variety of offerings hosted at our center and by the informal relationships that are formed and shaped along the way.


Other Ways You Can Help

We want everyone who feels inspired by our story and mission to participate, monetarily or otherwise! 

Here’s how you can help other than financially:

  • We need new furniture!  Help us track-down donations or find great deals.
  • Spread the word about the good work we do and share our campaign with people you know.  Contact us if you want to learn more about who we are.
  • Pay us a visit, come to an event, or send us a message to setup a conversation if you want to learn more.
  • If you're a Boulder local, come join the rebuild parties, and see more of what we're doing.
